Your opponent is already engaged in an <color=#ffffff>ARENA BATTLE</color>. You can either choose a new opponent or wait for the battle to finish.
Your current rank in the Arena!
Continue fighting to increase your rank and receive better <color=#ffffff>REWARDS</color>! Rewards are delivered on a daily basis to your <color=#ffffff>INBOX</color> based on your current rank.

CONGRATULATIONS! Continue fighting to increase your rank and receive better <color=#ffffff>REWARDS</color>! Rewards are delivered on a daily basis to your <color=#ffffff>INBOX</color> based on your current rank.
Here is everything you need to know.

1) Set up your defenses (5-character squad required).

2) Challenge opponents based on their rank. If you win, you will swap ranks with them. If you lose, your rank will remain unchanged.

3) After each battle, you must wait a set period of time before you can enter the next battle. If you do not wish to wait, you can bypass the wait period by spending POWER CORES.

4) You will receive a payout in your Inbox every 24 hours based on your reward tier. Additionally, the number of attacks allowed daily will reset.

5) Your Arena is determined by your timezone and the date when you join. Each Arena has a maximum number of players allowed, and when it reaches full capacity, a new one is created.

6) While you are participating in an active battle, you can still be attacked by other players.
You have reached your daily limit.\nThe daily limit will reset tomorrow.
Congratulations! You reached Rank {rank} in the Arena.\nClaim your reward.
Check back later to see if your rank has changed.
Set the combat options for your Arena battles.
You are given 5 attempts per day, which are consumed upon starting a battle. Attempts are reset every 24 hours.

Commander, I'm glad you're here. \nWe have a situation.
Interdimensional signatures are popping up all over New York City.
As commander of S.T.R.I.K.E., interdimensional threats are your jurisdiction.
I've taken the liberty of assigning you two agents.
No one knows New York City like Spider-Man. He should come in handy.
I've also transferred my top medic to S.T.R.I.K.E. for additional support.
Looks like Kingpin is helping smuggle interdimensional <color=#fff568>ORBS</color> into the city.
We should start by intercepting his shipment.
Hey Commander! We intercepted Kingpin's guys transporting the interdimensional glowing things.
But Kingpin's mercs won't hand the orbs over. I even said "please!"
Use the S.H.I.E.L.D. Medic's <color=#fff568>SPECIAL ABILITY</color> to heal your squad.
Use Spider-Man's <color=#fff568>SPECIAL ABILITY</color> to defeat the remaining mercenaries.
Good work. Now bring those <color=#fff568>POWER CORES</color> back to base. \nWe can use them to open one of the orbs your team recovered.
Maybe if we use our remaining <color=#fff568>POWER CORES</color> we can open one of the <color=#fff568>ORBS</color>...
Select the <color=#fff568>PREMIUM ORB</color> to enter the <color=#fff568>ORB CHAMBER</color>.
Use the <color=#fff568>POWER CORES</color> to open the <color=#fff568>ORB</color> you recovered.
Luke Cage was inside that <color=#fff568>ORB</color>? \nHe does NOT look happy about that.
Sweet Christmas! \nThanks for getting me out of that thing.
Kingpin's abducting heroes around the city. He's using tech way out of his league.
Whatever Kingpin is up to, it needs to be stopped. Count me in.
Kingpin's our target. Your goals are tracked in <color=#fff568>DAILY OBJECTIVES</color>.
We've tracked Kingpin's operation to the warehouse district. Move out.
Complete <color=#fff568>MISSIONS</color> to make progress on your <color=#fff568>DAILY OBJECTIVE</color>.
This is where you set up your <color=#fff568>S.T.R.I.K.E. SQUAD</color> for each mission.
You can <color=#fff568>PRESS</color> and <color=#fff568>HOLD</color> an <color=#fff568>ABILITY</color> icon to get details about that <color=#fff568>ABILITY</color>.
Applying a <color=#fff568>TAUNT</color> effect forces enemies to target that unit.
You recovered a <color=#fff568>TRAINING MODULE</color>. \nLet's send Spider-Man through <color=#fff568>TRAINING</color>.
To send a S.T.R.I.K.E. character through <color=#fff568>TRAINING</color>, select your <color=#fff568>ROSTER</color>...
Make sure to <color=#fff568>TRAIN</color> your S.T.R.I.K.E. Force regularly.
We located Kingpin's warehouse. \nYour orders are to move in and engage.
The <color=#fff568>CAMPAIGN</color> continues in the <color=#fff568>HEROES ASSEMBLE CAMPAIGN</color>.
Completing another mission will fulfill your \n<color=#fff568>DAILY OBJECTIVE</color>.
<color=#fff568>SWITCH TARGETS</color> to focus your squad's attacks on <color=#fff568>ENEMY HEALERS</color>.
You completed a <color=#fff568>DAILY OBJECTIVE</color>. Good work.
Commander, I'm leaving you in charge of this matter. I'll check in with you later.
Continue the <color=#fff568>HEROES ASSEMBLE CAMPAIGN</color> to recruit <color=#fff568>THE PUNISHER</color>!
You're making good progress, Commander. \nYou just completed one of many <color=#fff568>ACHIEVEMENTS</color> for S.T.R.I.K.E.
Be sure to complete your <color=#fff568>ACHIEVEMENTS</color> and collect your rewards.
You almost have enough <color=#fff568>CHARACTER SHARDS</color> to unlock <color=#fff568>PUNISHER</color>.
Complete the next mission to obtain the final <color=#fff568>PUNISHER SHARD</color>!
Great job! Let's go unlock <color=#fff568>THE PUNISHER</color>!
New agents can be recruited from the <color=#fff568>ROSTER</color>.
Recruit <color=#fff568>THE PUNISHER</color> to your S.T.R.I.K.E. Force.
Take a moment to <color=#fff568>TRAIN THE PUNISHER</color> before adding him to your <color=#fff568>SQUAD</color>.
Fury said you needed a hand. Good thing I have two of those and a whole lot of guns.
This is where you can requisition <color=#fff568>SUPPLIES</color>, Commander.
We refresh our stock multiple times a day, so be sure to check back regularly for <color=#fff568>NEW SUPPLIES</color>.
As your <color=#fff568>COMMANDER LEVEL</color> increases, you will gain clearance for special, limited-time <color=#fff568>EVENT</color> missions.
Each of these <color=#fff568>EVENTS</color> offer unique benefits to either acquire powerful <color=#fff568>SUPPLIES</color> or new <color=#fff568>RECRUITS</color> for your S.T.R.I.K.E. Force.

<color=#fff568>CHALLENGES</color> test your skill as a Commander and reward you with <color=#fff568>TRAINING MODULES</color>, <color=#fff568>GEAR</color>, <color=#fff568>ABILITY MATERIALS</color>, and <color=#fff568>GOLD</color>.
As your <color=#fff568>COMMANDER LEVEL</color> increases, more difficult <color=#fff568>CHALLENGES</color> will appear with greater rewards.
Looks like Kingpin was also stealing <color=#fff568>S.T.R.I.K.E. GEAR</color>.
Let's put that <color=#fff568>GEAR</color> to good use. \n Spider-Man could use some new web shooters.
Increase the <color=#fff568>GEAR TIER</color> by completing a set of six <color=#fff568>GEAR</color> pieces and unlock new abilities.
The green icon means you have a piece of equippable <color=#fff568>GEAR</color>.
New web shooters! Being in S.T.R.I.K.E. has its perks!
Check back often to equip your characters with new <color=#fff568>GEAR</color> pieces.
Don't forget to claim your <color=#fff568>DAILY OBJECTIVE</color> for equipping <color=#fff568>GEAR</color>.
Commander of S.T.R.I.K.E., I am Loki of Asgard. Well... "an" Asgard.
I hail from a dimension where the Grandmaster reigns supreme.
As an envoy, I am scouting for new competitors in His Excellency's <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>.
In exchange for proving your strength against teams from other dimensions, you will be greatly <color=#fff568>REWARDED</color>!
Commander, we're taking the fight to Ultimus's forces. Let's launch a  <color=#fff568>BLITZ</color> to thin his ranks.
If we can defeat his troops, we'll rescue valuable allies and capture crucial supplies to aid in the war effort.
Send in a S.T.R.I.K.E. squad to knock out our corrupted foes, and I'll find you more targets. Let's keep the pressure on!
We are only one universe among a <color=#fff568>MULTIVERSE</color>, Commander. We aren't alone in the fight against Ultimus.
Here you can form <color=#fff568>ALLIANCES</color> and work together in accomplishing <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> against Ultimus's forces.
Create your own <color=#fff568>ALLIANCE</color>, join an existing alliance, or switch to a more powerful alliance. We leave it to you, Commander.
Here you will find <color=#fff568>SPECIAL EVENTS</color> with unique and valuable rewards.
Most <color=#fff568>EVENTS</color> only last for a <color=#fff568>LIMITED TIME</color>. Be sure to complete them before they expire.
Try completing the <color=#fff568>ELEKTRA EVENT</color> to obtain <color=#fff568>ELEKTRA</color>!
Commander, you have been making excellent progress. Are you aware we can simulate your past missions?
After completing a <color=#fff568>MISSION</color> with <color=#fff568>3 MEDALS</color>, you can <color=#fff568>AUTO WIN</color> the battle instantly.
Tap <color=#fff568>AUTO WIN</color> to collect <color=#fff568>GEAR</color> for your characters and earn more <color=#fff568>CHARACTER SHARDS</color>.
You can <color=#fff568>AUTO WIN</color> a mission up to ten times at once. Some missions can only <color=#fff568>AUTO WIN</color> a limited number of times per day.
Commander, I'm giving you access to S.H.I.E.L.D.'s internal communication network.
You will now be able to <color=#fff568>CHAT</color> with other Commanders across the globe.
In order to grant you access, you will need to register a <color=#fff568>CODE NAME</color>.
What will your <color=#fff568>CODE NAME</color> be, Commander?
You can't win every engagement, Commander. Return to base and <color=#fff568>TRAIN</color> your recruits.
<color=#fff568>TRAIN</color> and equip <color=#fff568>GEAR</color> to prepare for the next mission. Take your time. Good luck, Commander
[TEMP] Battle it out with other alliances for unique rewards.
[TEMP] Destroy the enemy's Helicarrier rooms to win!
Commander, you have collected enough <color=#fff568>SHARDS</color> to promote a <color=#fff568>CHARACTER</color> to the next <color=#fff568>STAR RANK</color>.
Increase the <color=#fff568>STAR RANK</color> of a member of S.T.R.I.K.E. once you have collected enough <color=#fff568>SHARDS</color>.
Promote this character and increase their <color=#fff568>STAR RANK</color>.
Achieve <color=#fff568>STAR RANK 7</color> to unlock their full potential!
Complete <color=#fff568>CAMPAIGN</color> missions, acquire <color=#fff568>SUPPLIES</color>, or unlock <color=#fff568>ORBS</color> to collect more <color=#fff568>SHARDS</color>.
Commander, did you know you can <color=#fff568>AUTO WIN CHALLENGES</color> that you have completed with a <color=#fff568>3-MEDAL VICTORY</color>?
<color=#fff568>AUTO WIN</color> allows you to automatically complete a <color=#fff568>CHALLENGE</color> and receive the <color=#fff568>REWARDS</color> immediately. Give it a try.
Commander, we're receiving reports that Ultimus has strongholds all over the multiverse.
You will need to work together with your <color=#fff568>ALLIANCE</color> in an <color=#fff568>ALLIANCE RAID</color> to clear them out.
To start an <color=#fff568>ALLIANCE RAID</color>, your <color=#fff568>ALLIANCE</color> will need to generate <color=#fff568>RAID KEYS</color>.
Each <color=#fff568>MEMBER</color> of your <color=#fff568>ALLIANCE</color> can generate <color=#fff568>RAID KEYS</color> by completing <color=#fff568>CAMPAIGN MISSIONS</color>.
Work together to unlock the next <color=#fff568>ALLIANCE RAID</color>.
Welcome to your first <color=#fff568>ALLIANCE RAID</color>, Commander.
Pick a <color=#fff568>PATH</color> to follow in order to clear out the enemies.
Each victory also holds a number of <color=#fff568>REWARDS</color> inside.
The more you contribute to the success of the <color=#fff568>ALLIANCE RAID</color>, the better your <color=#fff568>REWARDS</color> when the <color=#fff568>ALLIANCE RAID</color> is finished.
You have a character with <color=#fff568>TRAIT SYNERGIES</color>. Tap the <color=#fff568>ICON</color> to see what they are.
The Kree are abducting my associates and converting them to their cause.
I'm sure whoever rescued would be willing to join S.T.R.I.K.E.
We're getting reports of Elektra running rampant in Hell's Kitchen.
Daredevil, work with the Commander on this.
I'll take a team and track her down.
Elektra, the senseless killing has to stop.
Murdock, you fool. It's not me.
Someone is committing crimes in this city while wearing my face.
I was closing in on the imposter when you jumped me.
That explains a lot. We have a common enemy.
If we help you with the imposter, will you help us stop the one she works for?
The impostor is headed this way... and it looks like she is not alone.
There are a lot of imposters floating around these days.
The likeness is uncanny. What sort of magic is this?
No magic. I am YOU. Just empowered by my newfound faith... and deadlier.
The imposter was NOT my equal in strength and skill.
Fury says these corrupted versions of us are weaker than the ones from our dimension.
So we work for Nick Fury now?
Working together is the only chance we have of defeating this threat.
Very well. But don't expect me to wear a badge.
Wasn't even going to suggest it.
The Elektra imposter was working to corrupt the Hand Ninja Clan to the invaders' side.
If they take control of the Hand, they will have an army of ninjas at their side.
Nobu is the Hand's leader. That's who they will try to replace.
Then we have to get to him before they do.
Our only chance is getting to Nobu before they replace him with a corrupted version.
You enter my domain unannounced, ninja.
No time for formalities, Nobu. You are in danger. Imposters are attempting to--
If you are referring to our new friends, the Kree, then I believe you are too late.
They've already corrupted you. Then we do this the hard way.
Nobu has been corrupted. We have to take out the entire clan.
The Immortal Iron Fist, you are sworn enemy to the Hand. Now you fight with them?
The Hand, the Fist, and the Devil fight for a new leader now.
Then you must be put down as well.
There is someone else guiding the Hand. Someone pulling Nobu's strings.
Our true enemy has yet to reveal himself.
I sensed that a corrupted version of myself might be behind this.
Deep down you know this feels right. You just always let your conscience get in the way.
You know I won't let you get away with this.
I already have. The New York Hand belongs to me now. And I answer to another.
I doubt that is the last we will see of your corrupted version.
Probably. And as long as a corrupted Daredevil rules the Hand, he runs New York City.
We have to find a way to regain control of the Hand.
I think I have an idea...
We're getting reports of a bank robbery in Midtown. Take a team and check it out.
A bank robbery? Really? While there's an interdimensional alien invasion going on?
Crossbones is involved. He was one of the first Hydra agents to work for the invaders.
Aren't you supposed to be plotting world domination instead of robbing banks?
I don't work for our invaders anymore. They double-crossed me. All of Hydra, for that matter.
Their brainwashing commando squad should be showing up to kidnap me any minute now.
Here's the deal: I'll join S.T.R.I.K.E. and help you fight against them if you protect me from their commando squad.
Give me one good reason why I should trust a backstabbing Hydra mercenary like you?
Only one? For starters, I know a lot about your enemy's operation. Codes, procedures, transport sites...
And you know I pack a mean punch.
Let's get you some security clearance.
Okay, I joined your S.T.R.I.K.E. Force. Now you guys have to protect me from this brainwashing kidnap squad.
Alright. You're safe. Now tell us everything you know about the invaders.
Give me a second... I gotta get used to the idea of being a good guy.
You are NOT a good guy. You're just the lesser of two evils.
Wow. You really know how to make a guy feel special.
The invaders' first step is to ally with evil organizations and get them to abduct heroes.
They trap the heroes in those orbs and send them through the portals for corruption.
Let me guess: Then they double-cross the bad guys and convert them, too.
Yeah. They left that part out of the initial sales pitch.
So now we're going to intercept a shipment of orbs as payback.
Now we just follow the trail back to the warehouse where they are sending these orbs through the portal.
You're actually enjoying this, aren't you?
Screwing over the guys who promised me the world and then tried to brainwash me?
This is one of the black sites for Ultimus's kidnappers. Looks like they didn't relocate.
Inside is usually where they keep the portal that they send the orbs through.
And on the other side is where they put them through the Conversion Process?
Yep. And what comes back is completely loyal to Ultimus.
Crossbones. They told me you had tried to run.
Thanks for saving me the trouble of having to pursue you.
While I'm here, mind if we completely destroy your operation?
Korath is always running his mouth about "pursuing this" and "pursuing that."
Now the only thing he is pursuing is my fist!
Only thing left to do is get in there and smash the portal.
Then Ultimus can't receive captured heroes in orbs and convert them.
Except for the dozens of other portals he's set up around the world.
Well, at least it's a start.
You really are a "glass half full" sort of girl.
You didn't really think you could just march in here and destroy our portal, did you?
Of course not. We planned on beating you up first.
Heads up, Latex. A corrupted version of Red Skull will be guarding the portal.
The Head of Hydra. Is that going to be a problem for you?
Not at all. I've thought of punching the REAL Red Skull in the face many times.
Beating up an Ultimus-controlled puppet version is close enough.
I'm starting to enjoy working with you.
Crossbones. You have betrayed Hydra and Ultimus for the last time.
Fine by me. Wasn't really planning on betraying you guys TWICE.
You shall pay for your betrayal.
You got it all wrong, Red Cheeks.
It's YOU who's going to pay. With my FIST!
You really have to work on your comebacks.
Smell that, Red? Sweet revenge. There's nothing like it.
Can you even smell through that mask?
Agents of S.T.R.I.K.E., it looks like we have another problem brewing in New York.
New York. You mean "The City That Never Sleeps Because It's Always Under Attack?"
We're already following the trail of destruction. Thanos has arrived, but what does he want?
I believe he sees Ultimus as a rival and seeks to destroy him.
Thanos versus Ultimus? We should just let them fight it out.
It's true that Thanos is one of the few beings who rivals Ultimus in power. However, the collateral damage would be devastating.
We'll have to deploy a team to lure Thanos out of the city. Parker, do you copy?
Special Agent Peter Parker reporting from the scene, sir! I'll try to get his attention.
Deploy a team to slow down Thanos, or at least to lure him out of the city.
Hey Purple Reign, could I get you to take this thing outside?
And by outside, I mean, not on my home planet?
Be gone, insolent child. I will not yield until Ultimus lies broken before me.
Commander, I don't think he's interested in a team-up.
Ultimus! Stop hiding behind these pathetic mortals. Face me!
Mad Titan, I welcome the challenge.
Thanos, without your precious Infinity Stones, you are no match for me.
You need a lesson in humility. Perhaps if I exile you to another dimension you will come to know your true station in the grand order.
I think Thanos is waking up. Don't be mad, big guy, but I have some not-great news for you...
We've been captured by Ultimus, sent to another dimension, and trapped in a Kree Prison ship with Star-Lord and Gamora.
A temporary setback. If Ultimus thinks this paltry vessel can hold Thanos, he is sorely mistaken.
Gamora, does this egomaniac always refer to himself in the third person?
Once I free myself from this ship, I will locate the Reality Stone and use it to return to our dimension.
Thanos, we're trapped here together. For now, we're your only allies.
So it seems. Let us see how well you were trained in THIS dimension.
Excellent, we have taken control of the ship.
Yeah, but you damaged the primary flight controls!
Hold on, everyone! I'll try to make this landing a little less crashy!
Any landing you can walk away from, right? So, what's the next step to getting us back to our dimension, Captain Titanic?
The Infinity Stones. If I can find the Reality Stone in this dimension, I can use it to open a gateway.
I know the unique quantum wave signature of the stone. Find me a multiphasic tetraplex scanner.
Oh, that's all? A powerful scanner like that is incredibly rare. There's only one in this quadrant.
Sounds like we need a new ship.
I saw a starport in that direction before we crashed. Let's take out the guards and find a ship.
There's the starport. There's a suitable ship on the launch pad.
Spidey-Sense tingling. The guards have spotted us!
You ain't gettin' anywhere near that spaceship, Bub!
They've raised the alarm. We will crush their guards and see them driven before us.
Peter, can you create a diversion so we can get inside?
You know it! See you on the flipside. And Gamora... be careful.
Star-Lord drew off most of the patrols, but we'll still have to get past the perimeter guards.
Let them come. I will leave their broken bodies behind as a message to Ultimus.
You think you can take on ALL of us? Who do you think you are!?
I am Thanos, the Last Titan... And this day will be your last.
Your cruelty serves you well, as ever.
I was trained by the Thanos of this dimension, not by you. Ultimus vanquished him long ago.
Hey corrupted Yondu and corrupted... uh... me... Can we maybe just borrow your ship?
Boy, you got some stones on you. Ain't nobody getting on my ship without my say-so.
How about a showdown? You win, you get the ship. We win, we get Thanos in chains.
I can take you both alone.
That wouldn't be sporting, would it? Choose a partner.
Alright, kiddo, let's show 'em what we're made of.
Some tough guy you turned out to be.
Pitiful whelps. They never seem to learn.
Sensors are detecting the multiphasic scanner on the world below. Energy readings are off the charts.
I need access to the central control capsule if I am to locate the Reality Stone.
I'll set us down out of range of their guns. I don't feel like crashing again.
Do as you must, fragile human.
This planet's defenses are pathetic. Ultimus shows no end of hubris.
The scanner isn't far from here. It will be more heavily guarded.
Loki, look at these fools. They think they can harbor a fugitive without retribution.
Well, at the very least, they ought to provide us with some degree of entertainment.
There was a time when it meant something to be a god.
At last, the central controls. Step aside, tin toy, or be crushed beneath my boot.
Don't think so, Thanos. I'm willing to sacrifice everything for Ultimus.
Stark, seriously, don't mess with this guy. He has a flying golden throne.
At last. We shall now return home and exact our revenge on the usurper.
Nebula, you disappoint me in every dimension, it seems. You would serve that false idol and fight with these peons?
I learned the power of Ultimus when he destroyed the Thanos of this dimension.
And now I will see you defeated yet again... "Father."
So, I am forced to break you once more. Such a shame.
All that's left is to enter the control capsule and locate the Reality Stone. Then we return to the Nexus dimension.
I will focus the array while Thanos searches for the Reality Stone's signature.
The control capsule is online. I can already feel the energy coursing through me.
I'm reaching out, but I cannot feel the Reality Stone. More power!
The power... I can feel it... flowing through me... my strength, it... wait... NO...
Something is wrong. Let me try to regain control.
We've lost our Operator. We need to regroup.
No! The system shut me out!
Thanos, you have made this all too easy.
I knew you would be drawn to the promise of power.
It was the only way I could lure an Eternal like you into my Conversion Engine.
And in one stroke I have eliminated a threat and gained an invaluable weapon.
YES. I CAN FEEL THE POWER COURSING THROUGH ME. ALL HAIL ULTIMUS!
Looks like I found you just in time.
Doctor Strange! How did you find us?
I tracked your life essence across the Plains of Phlogiston.
Right. Well, whatever else you have up your sleeve, now's the time.
If you can hold off Thanos, I think I can open a portal back to our dimension.
By the Ruby Rings of Raggadorr...
By the Mystic Moons of Munnopor...
By the Hoary Hosts of Hoggoth...
THERE IS NO ESCAPE. I WILL CRUSH YOU IN THE NAME OF ULTIMUS!
By the Fangs of Farallah, we do implore ye passage through...
YOU HAVE NOWHERE TO RUN. ACCEPT YOUR FATE AND SUBMIT.
Strange, let us come with you. Thanos cannot be saved.
Follow me and I'll deliver you to safety. Quickly, through the gateway!
Looks like this is good-bye for now, Purple Haze.
Just wanted you to know, even though it ultimately ended horribly for you...
With you getting corrupted and now controlled by Ultimus...
For the briefest of moments there, when we were fighting all those Ravagers...
Psych! Just kidding! Later, you maniac!
It's me! Your friendly neighborhood merc with a mouth... Deadpool.
Today you're in for a treat. I'm giving you exclusive access to a new game I made called...
What does the S.T.R.I.K.E. stand for? I'm glad you asked.
Superhero... Tyrannosaurus... Ridonculous-- No, Retrograde... never mind. It's top secret.
Once upon a time, a big blue alien named Ultimus invaded Earth and left a trail of destruction that laid waste to one man's most beloved eatery...
That place was Mauricio's Chimichanga Emporium.
I will have my revenge, and it will be EXTRA SPICY.
Hey, faceless minion! Bad news for you, buddy.
I came here to kick red-eyed butt and eat chimichangas, and I'm all out of chimichangas.
Is that Deadpool? I heard you were dead!
Sadly for YOU, I survived the blast that took the life of my most cherished chimichanga restaurant.
And let me tell you that nothing hurts more than boiling salsa deep inside a third degree burn.
Except maybe what I'm about to do to YOU.
Well, that was FUN. Tell me what you were doing here, or I'm gonna kill you even harder.
If you're looking for that mutant we captured, you're too late. He's probably being stuffed into an orb right now.
Looks like the merc convoy is about to leave, but they're setting up a bomb to cover their tracks. Not on my watch!
Pro-tip: Use my Special Attack and you'll be able to take out that naughty boy that's trying to arm the bomb.
Wait, are you on AUTO PLAY? Use my Special Ability!
Vengeance will be mine! I swear on Thor's bulging biceps!
You done good, boss. We took down all those mercs without even breaking a sweat.
I'm definitely bleeding, but no sweat.
Let's make like Quicksilver and follow that convoy.
Wasn't it great getting to beat the crap out of a bunch of bad guys using my Basic and Special Abilities?
Now you get to put on my big boy pants and use my Ultimate Attack.
We're gonna fight a bunch of goons on a classic New York rooftop, and then find out who they captured...
And Bullseye's gonna be waiting for me and he's gonna be angry for some reason. High drama, there.
It is I, the one and only Deadpool. I am here to save the damsel in distress from the clutches of EVIL.
Bullseye said to kill you before you talk us to death.
I would respond with some pithy comment, but that would just be proving your point.
So instead I'm just going to stand here silently in my idle pose looking menacing and--
Oh, I see. It's swords for you, mister!
Finally, a real challenge. Bullseye, baby!
If I cut off your head, does your body regrow from there, or do you grow a new head on your headless body?
Both. I'm an asexual organism. Science, kids. Stay in school.
BOOM. Now THAT is how we DO it.
Joke's on you, funny man... the hostage is in another warehouse.
What?! Do I look like an Italian plumber to you? Now I have to start all over!
Logan, Deadpool is wreaking havoc in the streets.
The last thing we need is a wild card like him running rampant.
I'll track him down and find out what he's up to.
Try to bring him in. He'd be a valuable asset.
Wolverine? Here? What a surprise. I am SHOCKED.
Quit your yammering, Pool. What are you doing out here roughing up corrupted mercs?
Outta my way, fuzzy and furious. I've got heroics to do.
Stand down, or I will put you down.
You are the world's least friendly Canadian. But since you insist...
Wow, strict language filters in this game. What I meant to say was...
Fury wants me to bring you in, bub.
I was THIS CLOSE to rescuing whoever these goons were transferring to Ultimus. \nNow look at us...
I'll help you, but you have to stop this rampage.
I take back everything I ever said about you in the last five minutes!
Oh my gosh, I've been looking forward to this team-up for years. Deadpool and Wolverine. YES.
So, what is all that fancy S.T.R.I.K.E. tech telling you about this crime scene?
Running scan data against S.H.I.E.L.D. records now...
This can't be possible. It's the Techno-Organic Virus.
What a twist! Only Cable carries the T-O Virus. Let's go rescue him!
Oh man, those flaming red eyes are fierce! LOVING IT.
You're too late, human. We've already extracted the Techno-Organic Virus.
I've seen this tech before. Ultimus uses it to corrupt people into slaves.
So? It's not like he's gonna use the Techno-Organic Virus to corrupt people with a contagious, self-replicating...

If we move in silently, we could--
Spider-Man. OMG OMG OMG! Well, evil Spider-Man. I love you, but I have to eviscerate you to free Cable.
Cable, we're here to rescue you!
Too late. They've pulled a sample of the Techno-Organic Virus from my blood. They need to be stopped.
All the more reason to put that big 'ol gun of yours to use. Lock and load, big guy.
Long time, no see, Captain Grumpypants. What in the ever-loving heck is going on here?
In my future, Ultimus failed to conquer Nexus Earth, but that future isn't certain.
I came to this time to disrupt key moments of victory for Ultimus in hopes of preventing a darker future from materializing.
Ultimus was waiting for me, then extracted a sample of the Techno-Organic Virus from my system.
Looks like I just made things worse by coming here.
Wolverine and I are the two best Weapons X ever. We got you, brother!
We need to destroy the samples of the T-O Virus they took from my blood and torch the whole operation. Let's move.

Follow my lead and we'll have the advantage.
Kids, this means that with Cable on your team, your squad will start with their speed bars partially filled! Wowzers!

Looks like Thanos is guarding it. He's corrupted.

Deadpool and Cable. These will be the final moments of your insignificant lives.

Scientist Supreme and Ultron are teaming up to make a new batch of the corrupted virus for Ultimus.
Jiminy Jillickers, Cable! Whatever shall we do?
I might just sew your mouth shut.

Alrighty then. Time to take out a sexy scientist and a super genius.

We should probably go AUTO WIN some campaign missions and gear up, huh?
We need to keep moving. Whoever's in charge is up ahead. Stay frosty.
Whoever is in charge of this project is not someone we should take lightly.
I wouldn't have it any other way.

Soon they would be faced with the greatest challenge of their lives...
What do you think I'm doing? This helps me focus my chi. Have some respect.
You will be the first to see the fruits of my labor. You should feel honored to become one with Ultimus.
Not so fast, Robo Gandhi. If we take out your operators, you won't be able to beat us in this mission.
DP, that's not gonna work. We have to take out Vision first. It's our only shot.
That's why I love you, Cable. You always go right for the cojones.
Vision's operators are prepping the virus. We need to take him out quickly.
Yeah, if we don't take Vision out, things are gonna get real weird, real fast.
Ok, the pucker factor is a little too high. Get Vision, now!
At last, my virus is airborne. There's no stopping it now.
You fools... I'm trying to save you. With this virus we could have all become one.
And with that... He was gone. People for years to come would ask, where did Vision go? Why did he do what he did?
The fight is long from over.
With every pivotal moment, Ultimus could own the future. We have to stop him.
And we need S.T.R.I.K.E. to help get it done.
Right, right, right. That's the perfect segue. Good call, Cable.
If you help Cable fight enough bad guys in the Deadpool Raids, you might get enough points and wizbangs to unlock me in the game.
Then you can play with me forever.
Excuse me, I'm gonna have to see your lanyard if you want to proceed to T.A.H.I.T.I.
Wait... are you a Life-Model Decoy? Halt!
You have been judged! The sentence...
More Deadpool! ...Now how do you want to be executed? Guns, swords, or by being gummed to death by toothless weasels?
Fisk! What is this rabble doing here!? Be a good chap and order the servants to put bullets in our guests.
Good help is so hard to find these days. Come on, Fisk. Chop chop!
Initiating attack pattern I LOVE SPIDER-MAN.
Let's form Ultron! I can form the head!

Look no further than Deadpool's for Hire!

The Eye of Chimichanga compels you!
Hi, I'm Deadpool, and this is my friend, Deadpool.
Hi, I'm Deadpool, and this is my friend, Deadpool..

Let's see what kind of damage a remote-controlled Iron Man suit can do. Switch that thing on!

Any chatter out there on the dark web linked to our missing cargo?

Mercenaries, Hand Ninjas, and the Mask of Ogun. It's gonna be a blast.

So they're a bunch of evil blue Indiana Joneses? Noted.
Clint, time to bring the fight to these mercs' doorstep. We got a read on their safehouse yet?
Affirmative. They work out of an abandoned Hydra armory.
Humans, prove yourselves worthy of the gifts you have been given.
Defeat these fools from S.H.I.E.L.D. and earn your place within the Legion.
Looks like we know who wears the pants in this crew.
Have fun taking out the mercs. I've got the blue one.
Tony, you seeing what I'm seeing? These mercs have blue patches of skin.
Hard to say, but it looks like it's spreading across this guy's whole body.
Hey Smurfette, you wanna tell us what's going on here with your happy little army of blue-ish mooks?

I gotta say... I'm a LITTLE disappointed right now.

So the Lunatic Legion is turning humans into Inhumans?

And taking control of the Kree Monolith gives them access to a massive cache of Terrigen...
which could make this thing at risk of going global.
Daisy, have you been able to track down the Monolith yet?
I've been scanning the surface of the moon since the Lunatic Legion has been known to operate from there in the past.
It appears a transmission was in fact sent from the armory to the Blue Area of the Moon just before we raided it.
Hey Clint, ever wanted to go take a walk on the moon?

I should have bought that company and fired them all when I had the chance.

Tony! How nice to see you!

Put down the beakers, turn off the Bunsen burners, and hand over your science fair project.
Oh, please. You can't seriously be angry with me?

Ok, playtime's over. Cough it up, Craziness Supreme.

Friday is telling me that there is a squad of corrupted Avengers protecting the bomb up ahead.
Wouldn't have it any other way.
Hey everybody, look! It's Tony Stark, the big brave hero, and he's come to save the day!
Hah! That guy is a dead ringer for you, Tony.
Oh please, I do not sound like that. Wait. Do I?
Not good. They've set the ship on a crash course for the Pacific Ocean.
Tony, get that vaccine into the bomb's viral release cannister before we hit atmo!
Just a twist to the left... and... it's locked in!

Have you asked Hope to help on this one? You know, to make sure I don't screw things up this time?
The Wasp is off on a different operation with Black Widow. You're on your own this time.
Alright, Scott... You can DO this...
Okay, listen up. This facility is controlled by a corrupted Vision.
We need you to get in and disable the security grid so we can sneak your support team in.
And Lang, try not to accidentally go Giant-Man on us while in transit.
Last time your enormous butt crushed my favorite laptop.
Yeah, that was an unfortunate mishap. Sorry.
Okay, going tiny to sneak in went smoothly.
This should be a piece of cake as long as I can evade the guards.
USE ANT-MAN'S <color=#fff568>SPECIAL ABILITY</color>\nTO <color=#fff568>ABILITY BLOCK</color> AN ENEMY.
USE HIS <color=#fff568>ULTIMATE ABILITY</color>\nTO <color=#fff568>SLOW</color> ALL OPPONENTS AT ONCE.
I've disabled the security grid. Team is a go to infiltrate the... uh, facility, post haste... now.

Right after I take a peak inside that shiny-looking vault over there... \nCan't pass THAT up...
Huh. It's just an orb chamber. But a REALLY fancy-looking one...

I'm sending a team in. You want in?
It's okay to beat up these S.H.I.E.L.D. guys since they're corrupted, right? Still feels wrong...
The energy trail leads inside. Let's move.
Looks like there's a crate of orbs in here that match what we're looking for.
I'm guessing there are a bunch of corrupted jerks guarding it, too? Game time.
These orbs are the property of the one true Vision. Leave now or feel the wrath of Ultimus.
Lang, the readings for this orb are off the charts.
We need to bring this orb back to the Helicarrier for further analysis.
Bring a mysterious super-charged orb back onto our flying aircraft carrier. Sounds safe.
Agent Johnson, I just attempted to perform a cursory scan of the orb.
But there's some sort of stasis field blocking my scanners.
Too bad I can't shrink a whole squad into the orb to investigate from the inside.
Actually... that might now be possible.
After pooling our resources together for S.T.R.I.K.E., Hank Pym recently made a breakthrough.
We can now create a force field and safely shrink everything inside.
So let me get this straight.
Hank made some new tech that would greatly enhance our ability to work with Pym Particles, and he didn't tell me about it?
So now, all we have to do is disrupt a small section of the stasis field...
And then, using new experimental Pym tech, shrink us as a team inside the gap.
Maybe if I STOPPED talking, bad guys would stop showing up right afterwards.
Surrender now and you will have the honor to join the ranks of the one true Vision's enlightened sect.
Is that an evil cult? That sounds like an evil cult. NO, THANK YOU.
Your window for shrinking inside that orb will be limited. Cover me while I prepare the temporary disruption.
Field disruption point acquired. Preparing for rapid reduction activation...
Our operator is down. No way inside that orb now.
Field disruption is stable. Go now!
Lang, Bucky and I are with you. \nTime to get small!
Huh, this is interesting... Looks like a giant, well, tiny, megastructure inside this orb.
I think I can see some kind of access door down there.
There's a tiny jungle in here. With tiny cranes. And even tiny corrupted Hydra forces.
Lang, what the heck are we even LOOKING at in here?
Now, I could be wrong, I'm just an electrical engineer...
But I THINK we're on some sort of tiny version of... Earth?
Inside some kind of a planetary Dyson Sphere? It's got an artificial sun in here and everything.
Sure. Still not the strangest place I've been.
My scans have confirmed this definitely resembles our Earth, just a lot... smaller?
What about that fleet of Kree warships off in the distance over there?
It looks like Ultimus is planning some sort of tiny invasion from here.
Let's head back outside, grow to normal size, tell S.T.R.I.K.E., maybe then chuck this thing into the sun...
...after we fight this tiny Thanos and his tiny daughters. Of course.
You may have found this planet, but you will never leave it alive.
We will make sure of that. It is the will of Ultimus.
Shouldn't you be off looking for an itty bitty infinity gauntlet? Leave us out of this.
Okay, let's get the heck off of this rock.
Quake, you will not believe what we found inside this thing.
Lang, not now! We are under attack. Get back up here and help us!
What's going on? Who's attacking us!?
Who do you think? That corrupted Vision has launched a full-on assault on the Helicarrier.
Hey Tiny Dude, get your squad out here and ready to fight.
Yes sir, Hawkeye, sir. Right away, sir!
Yes, sir. I mean, sorry, sir. Sorry.
Oh man, that orb was crazy! There's a tiny Earth inside there. A tiny Earth!
Focus, Lang. One full-blown crisis at a time.
So that mega orb has a tiny planet inside. And there's a tiny Kree invasion!
That structure simulates sunlight and is suspending the entire planet somehow and...
--Look that's great and all, but we have a major problem.
Indeed. Disrupting the stasis field has made the orb unstable.
It's only a matter of time before the orb explodes in a massive supernova. Quite fascinating!
A regular massive supernova or a tiny massive supernova?
Never mind, that sounds bad regardless.
Yep. This is beyond our expertise, Lang. We need Hope.
Time to give her a call. Now.
Hey Hope, Scott here. Man oh man have I got a story for you...

Can you help us figure out how to prevent a tiny version of Earth from exploding?

I managed to trace the energy signature of the tech to a facility in the heart of the city.
We can't let that tech fall into Hydra hands.
I'll do some light recon. Be ready to bring in the cavalry when I give you the go-ahead.
Huh. Wasn't expecting to see a bunch of corrupted Scott Langs working as Hydra lackeys.
Yeah, well joke's on you, lady. We're the Ant-Men, and we're here to fumigate you.
Okay. Now I can officially confirm that even the corrupted versions of you are dorks.
USE WASP'S <color=#fff568>SPECIAL ABILITY</color>\nTO <color=#fff568>STUN</color> A TARGET WHEN CHARGED.
USE HER <color=#fff568>ULTIMATE ABILITY</color>\nTO <color=#fff568>ATTACK ALL</color>, EVEN <color=#fff568>STEALTHED</color> TARGETS.

Time is the LAST thing you've got.

Energy signatures are spiking in the processing sector up ahead.

I'm seeing signs that Wakandan tech is being used here. That combined with Pym tech...

Pym's technology is truly a marvel. When combined with my people's technology --

Or having a Kree Noble unleash a massive space fleet from the palm of her hands.
Let's just hope they haven't made any orbs with one of these things yet.
I've got a call coming in from Scott. One sec.
Hey Hope, Scott here. Man oh man have I got a story for you...
What did you screw up this time?
So let me get this straight...
You found a mysterious orb, went inside and found a tiny Earth, and now it's going to explode.
In a nutshell, yeah. Well, an orb. You get the idea.
I was telling these guys that we should just fire it at the sun and be done with it.
And, what, just incinerate the billions of tiny people in the process?
Oh, right. Yeah, that's a terrible plan. Maybe you should be coming up with the plans.
We'll focus our resources on further analyzing the origin of the orb's contents.
I'll track down corrupted Vision's ship, see if we can find any information on where this micro-planet came from.
And keep an eye on Ant-Man while I'm at it. You know, make sure he doesn't accidentally set off any other super bombs.
So how are we going to find corrupted Vision's ship?
I just sent out a distress call to corrupted forces asking for assistance from his team.
Working with you is SO much easier than working alone.
ANT-MAN'S <color=#fff568>BASIC ABILITY</color>\nGIVES THEM BOTH A <color=#fff568>POSITIVE EFFECT</color> FROM THE TARGET.
WHEN BRINGING <color=#fff568>BOTH HEROES</color> INTO A FIGHT,\nANT-MAN'S <color=#fff568>ULTIMATE ABILITY</color> IS MUCH STRONGER.
Now that we took them out, we can take their shuttle and use autopilot to return to Vision's ship.
You make this look so easy! It never goes this smooth for me.
Further analysis of the mini-Earth shows that it is from another fallen dimension.
Ultimus has found a way to shrink the entire planet using Pym tech.
So if we return the orb to its dimension and find a way to reverse the process...
We could save the planet before it becomes too unstable and explodes.
But these mini-guys are bad guys, right?
They're not bad, Scott. Just corrupted by Ultimus. It's the right thing to do.
That doesn't come naturally to me. But I promised I would try harder so...
Let's do it. As long as I get to change my name to Captain Mini-Planet.

As the Nexus Being, the depths of your mind hold great strength.
I saw... myself, but as something called the Nexus Being.
There are tomes at the Sanctum Sanctorum that can tell us more.
I've been doing research on the Nexus Being, and if the legend is true, the chosen person is to guard the Nexus of All Realities.
What is the Nexus of All Realities?

Ultimus can never get the crystal.\nWe must destroy it!

Let's go show 'em. This is Ms. Marvel's town. Nobody messes with Jersey City!
Hey, you! Get away from that convenience store!
Use MS. MARVEL'S <color=#fff568>ULTIMATE ABILITY</color>\nto <color=#fff568>ATTACK ALL</color> and <color=#fff568>GENERATE ENERGY</color> for Hero Allies.
Use her <color=#fff568>SPECIAL ABILITY</color> to <color=#fff568>HEAL HERSELF</color> for a large amount of health.
Geez, there's no end to these guys.
At this rate, I'm gonna have to eat like 50 gyros to recover...
Hey, kid. Looks like you could use some support.
I can't believe that just happened... Definitely going in my next fanfic.
What's that, boy? You found something?
Looks like a space rock? We should probably hold onto it for safekeeping.
Hey, Quake. You told me to reach out to S.T.R.I.K.E. if I ever found any of those cosmic anomaly things in the area.
I found one. Near Coles High School in Jersey City.
I'll send you a S.T.R.I.K.E. team to help investigate.
As long as I get paid my finder's fee, works for me.
Huh. Some girl in cosplay is here fighting some aliens for the anomaly.
This isn't cosplay, I'm Ms. Marvel! Help me fight these bozos?
MS. MARVEL'S <color=#fff568>PASSIVE ABILITY</color> gives her <color=#fff568>TAUNT</color> when a <color=#fff568>HERO ALLY</color> drops below 50% health.

MS. MARVEL pairs very well with <color=#fff568>HERO BRAWLER</color> teammates like <color=#fff568>SPIDER-MAN</color>. She gains <color=#fff568>ASSIST NOW</color> at a much higher rate and provides <color=#fff568>DEFLECT</color> to these teammates.
I'm here on behalf of S.T.R.I.K.E., yada yada, please hand over that crystal so I can secure it for them.
As long as it's in safe hands from the bad guys, I've got no problem with that. Go ahead, take it.
Bizarro dog? Can you like zap this thing off of me maybe?
It's about to get worse. More corrupted forces incoming!
We have been sent to retrieve the anomaly. It belongs to Ultimus, by divine right.
Ultimus has already cost Earth way too much... No way.
What the heck is this crystal anyway?
No idea. I was told to find it and bring it to them. So that's what I'm gonna do.
And since Ultimus wants it, it's a big deal.
More Ultimus forces on the way. We need to find a vantage point to take them on.
I wonder why this crystal is stuck to me.
Kid, this is way above my pay grade. All I can do is help crack some skulls.
And get you back safely... maybe.
After this is over, wanna go grab a drink? I know a great bar just around the corner.
S.T.R.I.K.E. headquarters is not far from here. Still got more corrupted to deal with though.
Too bad Lockjaw can't just teleport us there. The crystal is messing with his abilities.
That giant dog can teleport?\nOf course it can.
Geez, this whole experience has been like that impossible level in Flibble Bobble!
Another gamer. You and Quake are gonna get along great.
Wait... do I get to meet Quake? She's a legend!
One multi-dimensional anomaly with bendy girl attached. You're welcome.
Ms. Marvel, it appears you are the lucky new host for the M'Kraan Crystal.
Is that what this thing is?
It is. And we need to find Scarlet Witch in order to unbind it from you.
Banished to the nether realm by Baron Mordo. I'm still trying to find out where that is.
More of Ultimus's forces are after the crystal.
Protect me while I finish searching for Scarlet Witch. I'm close to finding her.
By the Flames of the Faltine...
Uh oh, the wizard dude is down!
Ms. Marvel, quickly, go through the gateway. I can't hold it open for long. The crystal will find Scarlet Witch!
Holy moly, I'm going into another dimension. Wicked...
Not alone you're not. You can't send this kid in by herself! We're coming with.
So this is the nether realm, huh? Seems pretty creepy to me, boy.
All we gotta do is follow this M'Kraan Crystal thingy to wherever Scarlet Witch is.
Okay, these guys look pretty OP.
The spirits of the nether realm hunger for your life force...
Seems like the crystal starts vibrating when I point it in the right direction.
That's some solid game design! Well, magical object design, I guess.
Let's hurry it up and find this lady before this place devours us or something.
We're close. The crystal is making it pretty clear at this point.
Definitely glad I didn't touch that thing before you did. Gives me the heebie jeebies...
The M'Kraan Crystal... I must have that power...
I wouldn't eat it... I doubt that's Halal.
Something's wrong... The crystal is starting to pulse!
Scarlet Witch is being attacked by spirits up ahead.
Besides, if she takes a dirt nap, we're stuck here for eternity, right?
That would be bad. I'm supposed to feed Trish's cat tomorrow.
Be gone, demons. I must return to the Nexus realm... The crystal needs me...
Scarlet Witch, we're here to help! M'Kraan Crystal says hi by the way.
Scarlet Witch is down! Now we'll never get out of here...
Thank you! I don't even know how long I've been here.
With the power of the crystal near me, I can open a portal to return us home.
So, mission accomplished! Well, kind of. Do you know how to actually remove this thing?
Unfortunately, your guess is as good as mine. But I'm sure we can find a solution together.
Together? We're gonna do a team-up? I love team-ups!
Ready to get that M'Kraan Crystal off of you?
Polymorphing it off doesn't work, and NOW it's starting to itch. Ugh.
Intel indicates Scientist Supreme might be able to help.
She's been gathering parts to build a device that specializes in nullifying magical objects.
Then that's where we'll search first.
Word on the street says you're looking to make a device that nullifies magical objects.
True... But MY sources say you have a powerful crystal in your possession.\nHand it over.
Okay, fine, you win.\nCan't blame me for trying...
What the heck, lady! We came here for your help, and you tried to steal the crystal from us?
Look, Ultimus has the device you want.
My version is too early in prototyping to be of any use. It's embarrassing, really.
Why not just steal HIS version? I tried, believe me. Maybe you can succeed where I failed.
So Ultimus has a device that can unstick this thing from me? Let's go get it then!
Quake, can you help us track down where Ultimus is keeping such a device?
Ladies, no time for that, I need you back here, pronto. The Helicarrier is under attack.
Surrender now, or we'll raid this ship in the name of Ultimus!
Whoa. We're being attacked by space pirates?
It happens more often than you might think.
Ms. Marvel, are you feeling alright?
I... don't know. This crystal is starting to make me feel... weird.
With the crystal bound to her, it's running into unforeseen complications.
The healing factor in her Inhuman DNA is trying to feed off the energy in the M'Kraan Crystal. This is causing the crystal's temperature to rise.
Wait. Am I gonna explode? I don't wanna explode!
Stay calm. We can figure this out.
The good news is we've tracked down a possible location for Ultimus's device.
Head to the docks. The device is in a shipment intended for Ultimus.
There's the shipment. Let's take it off their hands.
Look, there's the device. We found it!
True, but we don't have the expertise to operate it and nullify the crystal.
We need to bring this back to Scientist Supreme.
Okay, so all we gotta do is bring this device back to Scientist Supreme so she can fix me before I explode.
Halt, heathens. Surrender that crystal and the Unbinder to us now, and we will spare you.
The Unbinder? Seriously? Who names these things?
You guys should really quit while you're behind.
You're going to walk away empty-handed.\nIf you're lucky.
Scientist Supreme, can you help us figure out how to activate this device?
We need to get this crystal away from Ms. Marvel immediately.
Of course! Let's take a closer look at it in my lab.
Hmmm... It looks like this Unbinder is missing two key components. A Conjure Stone and a Cosmic Cube.
A Conjure Stone... I know where to find one!
Since becoming the Nexus Being, I've begun to hear voices calling me to mystic objects of power.
There is a Conjure Stone close to here, I can feel it. It's being held in a nuclear submarine base controlled by Ultimus.
Cool! Let's go get it before this crystal makes me explode.
If you think you'll get this Conjure Stone without a fight, you are a fool.
Actually, I was planning to smack you with my giant hand and then yoink it from you.
Sounds like we're on the same page.
We've got the stone.\nOnly the Cosmic Cube remains.
That's good cuz... phew... Is it getting hot in here, or is it just me?
This M'Kraan Crystal is starting to get CRAZY hot now.
I am TOTES looking forward to taking a cold shower after all this is done with.
I sense the presence of a Cosmic Cube nearby.
I can hear it in that building. Looks like it's owned by something called Hope Yards--
Looks like we have a SNAKE problem in Jersey City. Again.
Hand over the Cosmic Cube, and I promise not to have Captain America kick your butt in my next fanfic.
You have taken a great risk to come here with the M'Kraan Crystal in your possession.
It's time to teach you both a lesson in humility.
How so? We've got the Cosmic Cube, and you're down for the count.
The Cube is of little importance, child.
The underground invasion of your pathetic city has already begun. You cannot stop it.
We have what we need to make the Unbinder work. Time to get that crystal off of you before it's too late.
I can't... not yet! This is MY city, and I can't stand by and watch Ultimus destroy it while I'm off saving my own skin.
But the M'Kraan Crystal might kill you! I can't let that happen to you.
Help me stop this invasion first. Please.
Very well. We can try. But we must get you back to Scientist Supreme immediately afterwards.
They've already got one of those portal thingies open down here! This is bad.
If we can fight them off, I can seal the portal from this side.
Alright, hold still, my dear.\nThis... is going to sting. A lot.
Good news! The M'Kraan Crystal is cooling rapidly. It's all yours, Scarlet Witch.
Yeah, I'm good. Thanks again for all the help.
You can call me Kamala, by the way.
I'm Wanda. Pleasure to meet you, Kamala.
Thanks to Nick Fury, we have tracked down nearly all the components necessary to resurrect the Supreme Intelligence.
All the more concerning that he's gone missing.
What do you mean? Has Ultimus captured him again?
Unknown. Last contact with Fury was behind enemy lines on planet Kallu.
That area is way too hot for a S.T.R.I.K.E. team. We'd never make it in one piece.
The Kree resistance will find him. Our minions can infiltrate enemy lines without risk of exposure.
It is our duty to track down Fury. Without him, the Supreme Intelligence cannot be brought back online.
Fury landed here on Kallu. We must follow the trail to his last known location.
After we rid this planet of these corrupted Ravagers...
Excellent work, team. Your reputations precede you.
Stop acting like you're running this squad just because you have a cape.
Do we know yet where Fury's trail ends?
Up ahead. Fury's tracks lead into that research facility on the ridge.
Scans indicate a heavy presence of Hydra soldiers guarding the lab.
Time to expel them from one of our worlds. Permanently.
Kree soldiers, you do not have the proper clearance to enter this facility.
Return to your assigned patrol duties, immediately.
You dare give orders to a Kree? Prepare to taste our wrath.
Do we know why Fury came to this facility?
It appears this facility was once run by one of our most-renowned scientists, Zara-Lar.
Perhaps he believes she can help bring back the Supreme Intelligence.
Those Hydra fools were so weak that we did not even need to use our Odium! Disappointing.
Your words strike true. We can only hope our future adversaries are worthy.
Records in the lab indicate that Fury surrendered without a fight and was taken to a Kree Warship for processing.
That is odd. I would have expected him to fell a dozen Hydra scum before capture.
We must assault one of Ultimus's Kree Warships in orbit to learn more.
Details of Fury's current location will be found in the ship's receiving logs.
Wait... You do NOT have the proper clearance codes to board this vessel!
And you do not have the will to serve the true Kree Empire.
What do the ship's records say about Fury?
He has been taken to Berhert. Ultimus has established a highly fortified prison there.
Then to Berhert we shall go. Saving Fury gives us hope to revive the Supreme Intelligence.
Do we have a path ahead to the prison mapped out?
Scans indicate that Ultimus has stationed S.H.I.E.L.D. patrols throughout the area.
He has S.H.I.E.L.D. forces out here?\nOn Berhert?
Affirmative. This planet holds his maximum security prison. Retrieving Nick Fury from there will be difficult.
A S.H.I.E.L.D. patrol has spotted us.
Not a concern. All I see are more heathens to reduce to ash.
Send word to Ronan. If we are to break Fury out of the prison, we need additional Kree support.
Agreed. I believe there is an optimal choice for the task...
The team's efforts thus far have been admirable.
You honor us, but we have more battles to win.
Nick Fury's cell is heavily guarded by corrupted mercenaries in the prison.
To make matters worse, he is scheduled for conversion within hours.
We cannot fight our way to his cell in time. I propose an alternative approach.
Have Ard-Con pose as Ultimus to get us to Nick Fury's cell with minimal resistance.
Ard-Con, are you up to the task?
It is but one step on the road to my revenge.
Hi there, Ultimus. Would you kindly give me the secret password so I don't have to stab-shoot you for being an imposter?
The password is... "step aside or I will rip you in half."
Incorrect. Prepare for the end, imposter!
Someone sounded the general alarm, and your eyes aren't glowing.
I figure you're here to set me free.
Good to see y'all. Though we can't leave here just yet.
You want to bring back the Supreme Intelligence? Can't do it without saving a Kree scientist named Zara-Lar.
Lucky for you, she's here in this prison.
The whole reason I'm in this prison is because I was searching for Zara-Lar.
The Kree scientist who is the final key to resurrecting the Supreme Intelligence.
When I discovered she'd been taken here, Ultimus's forces were closing in on me and I couldn't risk broadcasting the message to you.
So you let them capture you with the intent of confirming she was here?
Wreckless, but bold.\nYour reputation is well earned.
I'm just glad you guys were able to track me down in time.
Let's save Zara-Lar and get out of here before Ultimus gets wind of this.
Halt, prisoner! Fury's out of his cage. Contact the warden!
No time to mess around here, team. Put 'em down quickly so we can get Zara-Lar out.
Zara-Lar, we're here to free you. Ready to bring back the Supreme Intelligence?
Backing up the Supreme Intelligence in case of catastrophe is my life's work.\nOf course.
It is quite impressive how much progress you've made in your efforts to resurrect the Supreme Intelligence, human.
Ultimus is our mutual enemy. We only defeat him as allies.
The data cores were impounded when I was captured. All of the components required are here.
I just need time to bring the system online and upload my primary boot sequence to reference the backup archives of the elders.
We've got your back, but Ultimus has to have gotten wind of our plans by now. Expect heavy resistance forces to intercept.
You dare to revive this false Kree idol? Ultimus is the one and true god of all.
As protector of the Kree resistance, I vow to annihilate you and all corrupted in tribute.
Preparing initial boot sequence of the Supreme Intelligence.
All systems are green. Upload of archived elders activated.
It's nearly done. Resurrection sequence initiated!
The Supreme Intelligence is back online! We've done it!
Good. We finally have the tactical advantage we need to take down Ultimus.
Begin the process of searching for the optimal strategy to defeat him.
The Supreme Intelligence will remember what you've done, Nick Fury. Be sure of that.
Here's hoping. I almost got converted looking for a way to help save it...
Transfer the Supreme Intelligence to the Space Force destroyer.
I will ensure that they safely reach my stronghold.
With the invasion of Ultimus, New York City and its surrounding areas are becoming overwhelmed.
S.T.R.I.K.E. agents have been deployed and are doing their best...
But we need to organize all our local heroes to keep the situation from spiraling out of control.
Night Nurse, that's where you come in.
You have a pulse on what all of the area's local heroes are up to.\nTime to form up.
Sounds like a plan. Spider-Man needs help stopping a chemical weapons hand-off over in Queens.\nThat's where we'll start.
Spider-Man and a few S.T.R.I.K.E. rejects... Do you really think you can stop us?
Of course. Couldn't risk Ultimus's forces getting ahold of those chemical weapons from Dark Watch.
Luke's got a situation going down in Harlem that we should help with. Let's move.
Luke, brief us on the situation.
Word on the street is there's a bad batch of Vibranium in a warehouse here in Harlem.
The Vibranium is unstable and could be made into a large supply of lethal explosives.
We need to get to that shipment before corrupted forces can get their hands on it.
Haven't you brainwashed fools gotten the memo yet? Harlem is my town. Stay out.
That's one less thing to worry about now. What's next?
Punisher is planning to take out a Hydra squad intent on securing a cache of Judas rounds.
That would be great, but he's probably going to overdo it.
Let's make sure he doesn't get out of control.
Not interested in teaming up with you folks. I can handle this myself.
Punisher, we need to keep the collateral damage to a minimum. This city has suffered enough in this invasion.
Step aside, Cage. The special ammo they're transporting could hurt even you.
How about this? We help you here... you get to keep doing things "your way" in future fights against corrupted forces. How's that sound?
Works for me. Just don't start whining if things get too rough for your tastes.
Maybe I should make you a web gun or something.
Secure the ammunition quickly before the Punisher gets here!
Cache secured, Hydra scum crossed out. Win-win.
Can't celebrate just yet. Daredevil needs our help in Hell's Kitchen.
Corrupted Hand forces have somehow gotten their hands on some Chitauri weapons.
From the first invasion of New York by Loki? I thought S.H.I.E.L.D. had secured all of those.
Not all of them. Folks pop up with them from time to time.\nRemember Vulture?
If we don't get those weapons, it's going to make securing New York impossible.
So, is it easier or harder to fight Ultimus's army for you?
Easier. Something about their corruption gives them a unique vibrational signature.
Bad vibes, huh? My Spidey-Sense is dialed in, too.
That's the last of them. Time to regroup on the Helicarrier to figure out our next move.
Jessica, any luck tracking that corrupted Cosmic squad that's been roughing up Midtown?
I think they're using some kind of fancy alien tech to stay hidden.
They could have followed us back to the Helicarrier, and we wouldn't even know it.
Speaking of which... Spider-Sense tingling Bad vibes, guys!
I am so sick of fighting stupid aliens.\nThis is NOT what I signed up for.
What DID you sign up for?
Top-shelf booze. Fury promised me access to his personal supply.
Danny, how can we help you in the Upper West Side?
Things are looking pretty bad right now.
Ultimus has a team of corrupted mystics working on opening a dimensional gateway deep in the heart of the city.
Look, I'm not a wizard, magician, or whatever. What can I do to help?
Well, I discovered their super-secret weakness: really hard punches.
Okay, yeah, I can do that.
You cannot stop the opening of this gateway. It is the will of Ultimus.
I am the Immortal Iron Fist. You will fail. Count on it.
They have no chance of opening that portal now.
So, we win? Time for some R & R?
We're not done yet. Ms. Marvel needs our help.
The situation in Jersey City just went from bad to worse. We have to hurry!
Guys, I've been doing my best to keep them at bay, but they just keep coming.
They've started to overrun Jersey City. I don't think I can do this on my own!
You don't have to, Ms. Marvel.\nWe're a team.\nWe're the City Heroes!
This city belongs to Ultimus.\nSurrender now or be destroyed.
Not gonna happen. I'm Ms. Marvel and this is MY city.
No! Ultimus even has corrupted versions of me? This is bad.
Don't sweat it. He's got evil versions of all of us...
You know what? I think this team has a bright future ahead of it.
If we manage to save the multiverse and all that...
Oh, we should give ourselves a name!
What, City Heroes of S.T.R.I.K.E. isn't good enough?
Too wordy. East Side Avengers? Downtown Funk?\nKnights of New York?
Oh, right. Hmmm... This is tougher than I thought.
Looks like you need some medical attention. I'm calling in backup.
Kingpin is working with alien forces to abduct heroes and transport them in stasis orbs. You need to get to his warehouse before it's too late.
Kingpin said you might come looking for him. Your search ends here.
Why don't you pick on someone your own size?
Now take out these mercs and get to Kingpin.
So when do we get to find out what S.T.R.I.K.E. is about and what's going on here?
That's on a "need to know" basis, Spider-Man.
All you currently need to know is that you need to stop Kingpin and recover those orbs.
Geez. If I didn't "need to know," I wouldn't have asked.
The Kingpin ordered me to take you in. You're next on his list.
So Kingpin is trapping heroes in interdimensional orbs for some mysterious alien?
And Fury recruited us to stop him.
Have you MET Nick Fury? I'm surprised he told us THAT much.
This is where Kingpin is keeping those interdimensional orbs.
How did Fisk get his hands on alien tech like this?
Fools. I'm a part of something much bigger now.
Didn't know you could get any bigger...
Good job stopping Kingpin. It will take us months to get enough power cores to open all these orbs.
And there are heroes trapped in ALL of these orbs?
We'll have to open them to know for sure.
I let one of the trucks escape so we can follow it to the source.
We traced the truck back to a covert Hydra base in the mountains.
HYDRA? The scary world domination guys? What have they got to do with this?
That's what we need to find out.
Get in there and find out what Hydra is doing with those orbs.
Kingpin and Hydra are abducting heroes and trapping them in orbs.
But what is Hydra doing with the orbs once they're here?
I get the feeling we're about to find out.
Great. More heroes for the boss.
Didn't even have to go out and abduct you guys.
All the orbs are being moved to the center of the base.
That must be where we'll find our answers.
You're too late. This portal is already fully active.
In this mission, you have a special objective.
Take out the HYDRA OPERATOR before he activates the orb stasis device.
Then take out the rest of the mercenaries.
The device has been activated. Mission failed.
Interdimensional orbs. Genetically engineered soldiers. I picked a bad day to ditch school and join S.T.R.I.K.E.!
Colonel Fury says you need some firepower.
So he called you? Things are worse than I thought.
I'm here to do whatever it takes to complete the mission.
You will not stop Hydra and its new allies from converting this world.
Hydra is sending the orbs through an interdimensional portal. We need to shut it down.
Those Hydra Operators are sending the orbs through that interdimensional portal.
I got this. The rest of you move out of the way.
Punisher, we need to work as a team if we're going to get this done.
Fine, Cage. How do you want to do this?
We take down the <color=#fff568>OPERATORS</color> first to stop them from sending the orbs through.
You can take the lead on this one, Cage. But if things go sideways...
The Hydra Operators are sending the orbs through the portal.
We need to stop them before they send all the orbs through the portal.
THIS MISSION HAS A SPECIAL OBJECTIVE.
TAKE OUT THE HYDRA OPERATORS BEFORE THEY GET TO STAGE 4.
The Hydra Operators have sent the first orb through the portal.
They've sent half the orbs through the portal.
They've sent another orb through the portal!
We didn't take out the OPERATORS in time. We're too late.
We stopped Hydra from sending those orbs through the portal.
But I get the feeling this fight is far from over.
Guys, my Spidey-Sense is going off the charts. Something BIG is heading this way.
Now we take down these weird blue guys guarding this portal and destroy it.
You make it sound so easy.
What's the deal with these blue aliens guarding the portal?
Don't care. As long as they go down when I shoot them.
Uh, guys? What's the Hulk doing on the wrong side of the "good guy" line?
What was up with that weaker, but equally scary, Hulk attacking us?!
That was NOT the Hulk from our dimension. He was a corrupted version from an alternate dimension.
Get back to base. It's time I told you the true purpose of S.T.R.I.K.E. and what we're dealing with.
I guess that means we finally "need to know."
I created S.T.R.I.K.E. to deal with interdimensional threats...
The kind of stuff even S.H.I.E.L.D. or the Avengers are not equipped to deal with.
Definitely. Interdimensional portals are opening up all over the world.
Corrupted versions of Earth's most powerful and dangerous people are pouring out through them.
And we're the only ones who can stop them.
Can't we all just get along?
These are NOT heroes from our dimension.
They are corrupted versions from alternate dimensions. Take them down.
Soon you will all bow to the new king.
I'm in communication with Nick Furys from other dimensions.
Many warned me about this interdimensional threat before losing contact.
I had hoped they would never find our dimension.
What's so special about our dimension?
Most dimensions only connect to one or two others. But ours is unique.
It's a Nexus between dimensions... a gateway to countless other Earths.
If this dimension falls, the invaders will have access to thousands of other dimensions.
Aww, Iron Man? They corrupted you, too?
We have all been united for one singular purpose. You're next.
Gonna have to pass on that offer, Mr. Stark.
Kinda enjoying the whole "free will" thing.
We got a whole army of Iron Mans from other dimensions.
You really ARE full of yourself.
A group of corrupted Rocket Raccoons is running rampant through the city.
Hold up. Are you saying there are multiple versions of those jet pack rats?
Yes. They've conquered hundreds of dimensions before coming here.
And each one has the flying, talking squirrel in it?
Yes. They're also weapons experts. Exercise caution.
Hey! Who let the trash pandas out of their cages?
So do we call animal control or what?
The Commander is sending us to infiltrate this base and kidnap Ronan, one of the Kree generals leading the invasion.
What's the point in kidnapping one of these guys?
We need to know what their plan is. Ronan has the intel we need.
I bet I can make him talk.
That's not how S.T.R.I.K.E. operates, Punisher. We hold ourselves to a higher standard.
This is a TIMED mission. Take out the guards before time runs out.
Fall back. We ran out of time.
The big blue alien with the hammer is Ronan, the one we need to take down and bring back to base.
If this mission was easy, Fury wouldn't have sent S.T.R.I.K.E., right?
If you think you can defeat Ronan the Accuser, you are sorely mistaken.
We don't want to defeat you...
We just want to kidnap and interrogate you.
YOU MUST ONLY ELIMINATE <color=#fff568>RONAN</color> TO WIN THE MISSION.
This is a TIMED mission. Take out RONAN before time runs out.
We only need to take down Ronan. But we have to hurry.
We took too much time. We need to fall back.
We've got Ronan. Let's get out of here before reinforcements arrive.
We've got to get this Ronan guy back to base before he wakes up.
I've called for an extraction pod. We just need to hold out until it arrives.
The S.H.I.E.L.D. OPERATOR is down. She was our ride out of here!
The extraction pod has been called in.
The pod is zeroing in on our coordinates.
You're going to tell us everything we want to know about this invasion plan.
You will find out nothing from me.
We'll find out what Ronan knows, one way or another.
Colonel, we're receiving a broadcast on a restricted channel.
It's also being sent to every major intelligence agency and criminal organization in the world.
Leaders of this dimension. I am Ultimus.
I have come to accept your unconditional surrender.
In the dimension I come from, you have all already joined my cause.
And on every Earth I conquer, it plays out the same way.
Some of you will join me. Others will resist. But eventually...
ALL WILL SUBMIT TO MY WILL.
And to the leaders of S.T.R.I.K.E. who have already begun to meddle in my plans. Know this...
You will be the first to fall.
Sir, detecting multiple enemies closing in on the Helicarrier!
Never thought I'd say this, but...
We've come to get our Ronan back.
So they extracted your free will but left your sense of humor intact?
Another wave of Ultimus's forces just breached the Helicarrier!
They really want this Ronan guy back.
