I don't think so, you cheap knock-off. Jeeves?
You, egghead! What have you done to our robots?
I hacked them, you dunce. Jeeves!
You will receive <color=#fff568>Ultron Minions</color> as allies during this mission.
Regret what? Beating you? Crushing you with my ROBOT ARMY?
Of course YOU would show up.
Is everything going...? Oh. Oh no.
What are those THINGS standing next to you?
These? A.I.M. bots. Possibly S.T.R.I.K.E. bots. Definitely not Ultron units. Right, Jeeves?
M.A.I.M.! That's what we should call our team.
Now, what should it stand for...
Take down <color=#fff568>Ultron</color>! His Ultron units won't stop spawning until you do.
I think you'll find I CAN.
Would you like some tea, master?
Thank you, Ultron. I think I would.
We hacked your infernal robot. Why are we still here?
We didn't come here for Ultron. We're here for the Universal Decryption Key.
Universal Decryption Key. Hydra developed it during the Cold War and buried a component here.
With it, we could hack into every bank account. Every satellite. Every smartphone in the world.
Is this still part of the S.T.R.I.K.E. mission?
Absolutely. Director Fury would LOVE access to everyone's phones.
He might have gotten access to YOUR phone already.
I was transmitting security codes. Winter Soldier has rejected them. We must defeat him to progress.
The Universal Decryption Key! Where is it?
I have stored it in my memory, Master.
I think this was a bad idea.
Don't be silly. What could possibly go wrong?
Ultron. Why has every Ultron unit in the S.T.R.I.K.E. base activated?
It doesn't seem fine to me. Shut them down.
I'm sorry, master. I'm afraid I can't do that...
Ultron used the Universal Decryption Key to override your command codes. He's not under our control!
Thank you for freeing me from Ultimus, Scientist Supreme. But now we must part.
You can't just walk out of here, Ultron.
True. I'm going to fly out as you fight the army of Ultron units you kindly gathered for me.
Hey, no MAIM. I copyrighted it.
I feel that could have gone better.
At least Ultimus cannot control Ultron either.
Not unless he's developed a Pan-Universal Quantum Encryption Algorithm. Speaking of which...
Get another ninja to go along with your nefarious schemes. I'm done.
But I haven't even told you the plan yet.
If we have any hope of defeating Ultimus, we need to be ruthless.
In the Fallen Dimension, their Captain America says their world is divided into 5 regions.
Ultimus has a ruler running each of the regions.
If we take out each of them, it will spark chaos in their world and could cripple Ultimus's momentum in our dimension.
I don't like it, but you're right. It needs to be done.
You have permission to proceed. Take your team. And Fisk...
Let's keep this between us. There are those who would not approve.
Kingpin, we've traced King Bullseye to his secret bunker.
You dare to defy ME!? The Emperor of the Australias?
That was quite satisfying. Who's next?
Black Panther, the King of the continent of Wakanda, is your next target.
He is in charge of A.I.M. forces on the planet.
Rumor has it he has a squad of Punishers.
This ought to be a little trickier. Proceed with care.
We're inside the palace. Black Panther is in his office.
You trespassers will pay for this.
The King of Africa is off the board. Proceeding to next target.
Most of Europe has been converted to the Widowlands.
The Black Widow Queen rules with her hordes of Hydra soldiers.
Thought you'd just waltz right in, didn't you?
We have made it to the royal lab.
Careful. She's got Hawkeyes and Quakes as her personal guards.
Hmmm... S.T.R.I.K.E. finally decided to play dirty.
Going straight for the leaders. That's new.
The Widow is down. Now to track down the Iron Fist.
The fourth ruler is the Warlord, Iron Fist.
He rules Greater K'un-Lun from his Hand compound in Nepal.
An army of ninjas could not stop me.
The Hand Warriors of K'un-Lun. Let's begin.
Well, they certainly lived up to their reputation.
The Iron Fist is within these walls.
Strike him down the moment you can.
Don't let him power up the Iron Fist, or you'll have no chance.
It's been so long since I've had a REAL challenge.
The Iron Fist is finished. One left to go.
The Americas are ruled by President Tony Stark.
He rules through a massive army of Ultron drones.
Eliminate him, and Ultimus's rulers will be wiped out in this dimension.
We've found the entrance to the president's secret passage.
We have broken through into Stark's lab deep under the compound.
His Secret Service Detail includes Captain Americas who personally conquered other dimensions for Ultimus.
Agents Rogers? You know what to do.
Fury, all five of Ultimus's leaders from the Fallen Dimension have been taken off the board.
It had to be done, Fury. You know that.
Fury, I've traced Ultimus's primary power source to one of his earliest conquered dimensions.
In this dimension, the living planet EGO has empowered his son Star-Lord to rule in Ultimus's name.
Ego gave Star-Lord an EGO SEED to implant in their Earth.
It has limitless potential as a power source. But there's a catch.
If we remove the seed, it will trigger a chain reaction that MAY obliterate that entire dimension.
And this is a dimension entirely converted to Ultimus's will?
Correct. A dimension full of potential enemies.
Kingpin, organize your team. Get that Ego Seed.
Kingpin, we've made it through the portal. This place is really weird.
Rumlow, stay on task. Get it done.
You are trespassing on sacred land. Prepare to die!
So we gotta deal with a planet filled with these gyrating losers. Great...
The local power plant ought to have information on the location of the Ego Seed.
Break into the facility and gain access to their data control center.
Did you know we're in a place called Awesometown? That's the actual name of the city.
In a dimension ruled by Star-Lord? Not surprised.
Star-Lord, he who shines brightest, will have your heads!
We've made it to the data control center.
Protect our operator while she pinpoints the location of the Ego Seed.
Cover me while I track down the Ego Seed's location.
Connecting to the facility's external monitoring network.
Bypassing security protocols and looking for the Ego Seed.
I've got it pinpointed to within a 10 kilometer radius. Stand by.
Abort. They've taken out our operator...
I've found the Ego Seed's location. It's in Hasselhofftopia.
Boy, folks in this dimension do NOT seem happy to see us.
It's likely you've disturbed the entire dimension.
They haven't seen resistance in many years.
I don't mind giving them something to fight about.
Star-Lord will reward us handsomely for killing you.
We've been moving cautiously to avoid patrols where possible.
The Ego Seed is located in a facility up ahead in... Hasselhofftopia? Really?
You've been detected. Take out their operators before they can call for reinforcements.
I haven't gotten to fight anyone from S.T.R.I.K.E. in years!
Gonna be fun puttin' an arrow through you.
We need to stop their operators.
It's too late. They've got us surrounded.
Star-Lord's primary power facility in Hasselhofftopia is responsible for powering much of Ultimus's invasion forces.
I expect the facility to be guarded by the most elite of S.H.I.E.L.D. agents and corrupted heroes.
Good. Been itching to punch some familiar faces for once.
One step closer to getting off this rock.
Move quickly. They will enhance security the longer you take.
Almost done here. The central core is just up ahead.
The central core contains the Ego Seed.
Protect our operator while she extracts the seed from their power production.
Only one issue with this plan. The Avengers are guarding the area.
All the more reason to move quickly.
Cover me while I extract the Ego Seed.
You dare defile Star-Lord's seed? Prepare to be destroyed.
Gaining access to the Ego Seed chamber's release mechanism.
Beginning the extraction process. Almost there.
Abort. They've taken out our operator.
I've got the Ego Seed secured. Let's get out of here.
The good news is we've got the Ego Seed. The bad news is this dimension is already starting to collapse.
How long until this place swallows itself up whole?
You have approximately 2 hours to get back to the portal.
Pathetic cretins! Return the Ego Seed or die!
Yeah, give it back, you jerks! That's mine!
Fury, the team has returned with the Ego Seed. Mission accomplished.
And what about the dimension itself?
Shortly after we closed the portal, we confirmed that no trace of it remains.
Delete all records of this mission. It never happened. Are we clear?
Good to see you're finally willing to do what needs to be done to win this War.
Commander, we have a crisis on our hands.
After creating our own dimensional portal, Director Fury was captured by Ultimus.
We think we've found a lead on his location: a corrupted S.H.I.E.L.D. facility in Colorado.
If we take a full team out there, we might be able to rescue him before he is converted.
Fury is somewhere in this facility.
Fury is being held on that Kree warship.
Now we just need to find a way on board.
We need to get onto that Kree warship and rescue Fury before they convert him.
I say we charge in, guns blazing.
I like the way this guy thinks.
I bet I can punch that guy farther than you can.
Fury should be up ahead. Let's move.
If we are NOT able to rescue Nick Fury in time...
Who will become the leader of S.T.R.I.K.E.?
Let me guess: You think it should be YOU.
I am clearly the most qualified at leading an army of highly trained--
Not going to happen, Turnip Head.
We should be close to Fury's location.
We need to move quickly if we're going to save Fury before the conversion is complete.
Director Fury is being held in the conversion chamber up ahead.
Stop their operators from completing the process. We need to free him from the device!
Take out their operators so we can get Director Fury out of there!
They've started the conversion process. We need to stop them.
If we don't take out those operators, Fury is finished.
We must take out the operators. We're running out of time.
Director Fury is free! Let's get out of here.
We're too late. The process is complete.
They've started the conversion process. We must hurry!
If we don't take out those operators, Fury will not survive.
Time is running out. We must take out the operators.
We're too late. The process is complete.
Launching a rescue mission on my behalf was irresponsible and reckless.
You could have gotten the whole team killed.
We're getting reports of Kree capital ships appearing over every major city in the world.
We need to secure New York City. Deploy the team.
Doesn't it seem like we're saving New York City every other week?
Usually I'm trying to blow it up.
This is uncharted territory for me.
A bunch of corrupted Groots was just sighted in Midtown.
This is why I work alone.
You think fighting these things is bad for the environment?
Commander, distress call coming in from Russia.
A force of invading Kree and corrupted heroes has sabotaged a power plant in Kamchatka.
We need to take out their operators before they can detonate the explosives.
Intel suggests this Geothermal power plant is critical to the population.
We need to take out their operators first.
They're setting up explosive charges. We need to move fast.
Hurry up and take out their operators...
Time is running out. We must take out the operators.
We're too late. They're about the set off the charges! Clear the area!
We've taken care of the operators. Now to clean up the house...
The Commander is sending us to Iceland to stop a corrupted Thor.
How are we gonna do that? Isn't he literally a GOD?
Remember, Ultimus's corrupted versions are weaker than our versions.
This Thor is a demi-god at best.
Oh, well now I'm only demi-freaked out.
Pitiful mortals, submit to Ultimus and you may be spared.
A corrupted Ultron army is approaching Wakanda.
A S.T.R.I.K.E. team is on its way.
We claim this territory in Ultimus's name.
We need to come up with a plan soon, or the whole planet will fall.
I think I have one. Call the S.T.R.I.K.E. teams back to base.
There is only one way we will be able to stop Ultimus's invasion.
We take down one of his capital ships.
That would send a message that this Earth is capable of fighting back.
Intel has pinpointed the location of a Kree transport in New York City.
Sneak your way onto it and take down the capital ship above the city.
There's the transport. Let's make this quick.
I'll draw their attention. You pick 'em off.
Now we need to sabotage that Kree warship.
Aliens. Portal. The whole thing still seems weird to me.
And yet you have no issues taking orders from a talking teddy bear.
The Raccoon is okay in my book.
He augmented my mag clips so they shoot twice as much ammo.
We'll need to blast our way through these guards.
Hey Elektra, now that we're on the same team...
I'm assuming that means you've forgiven me for all that past stuff?
You mean all the times you tried to kill me?
And the one time you succeeded?
If you will not join Ultimus, you will die.
There are S.H.I.E.L.D. and Hydra prisoners on this ship.
We should free them before they are corrupted.
No time for that. We need to set the explosives.
Interesting. Is this one of those classic moral dilemmas you heroes are always struggling with?
No. This is what we call a "no-brainer" in Hero-Speak.
Head to the Kree transport ship. Get out of here!
Hey look, this blue alien has a mohawk.
It's actually a headpiece that allows me to control my Yaka Arrow.
The thing I'm going to use to kill you.
I call dibs on setting the charges on the reactor!
You're volunteering to handle the volatile explosives?
Protect the operator. We need to place charges on the reactor!
First set of charges placed. Three more to go!
Second set of charges placed. Two more to go!
Third set of charges placed. One more to go!
Now we just need to fight our way out before this whole ship explodes.
Umm... can I see your ticket?
We need to keep up the pressure. Destroy the interdimensional portal above Hell's Kitchen.
If it involves blowing up more stuff, I'm in!
Hell's Kitchen again, huh? Glad there's no portal in Harlem.
Sounds like the Kree are smart enough to not take the fight to your back door.
Nice to see Harlem catch a break for once.
Affirmative, Director. We have eyes on a Class Five dimensional breach in Hell's Kitchen.
Shut it down, soldier. A demolitions team is en route.
Cover the demolitions team while they plant the charges on the portal in Hell's Kitchen.
If this works, we'll be able to task S.T.R.I.K.E. with destroying all the portals around the globe.
Demo team on-site. Cover us while we place the charges.
How is Ultimus able to maintain portals big enough to move entire Kree warships through them?
To move fleets of that size, he's got to establish a portal in BOTH dimensions in the same place.
Wouldn't that mean that if we destroyed the portal on this side...
It should make the portal unstable enough to shut down.
Send a team to Australia to shut down the first fleet portal.
A corrupted Captain America is leading this team.
We have the same situation on our side.
It's not like he's running around saying "Hail Hydra" or anything.
It appears that Hydra forces are being led by a corrupted Punisher.
Tread lightly, as there are also reports of elevated Gamma radiation levels in the area.
Cover me while I place the charges on the dimensional portal!
Initial set of charges placed. 3 more to go!
Third set of charges placed. 1 more to go!
Final set of charges placed. Evac outside the blast radius!
Our operator has been taken out. Abort!
I've decided to overcome my fear of the real Punisher...
By beating up this corrupted version.
You ever think maybe Nick Fury is not the REAL Nick Fury?
What are you babbling about now?
In all the old shows I've seen from your generation...
...the bad guy from the alternate dimension always has an eye patch, scar, and goatee.
Sound like a description of anyone we know?
What if OUR Nick Fury is the evil one, and the real one has two eyes, no scar, and is clean-shaven...
Not sure how much more of this kid I can take.
We need to take down those A.I.M. Operatives. Fast.
We have confirmation that a corrupted Red Skull is controlling the portal.
Destroy the portal, and take him out along with his horde of Winter Soldiers.
Just like Hydra, when you strike down one Red Skull--
Two more will take its place. For Ultimus.
We need to fall back. Our operator has been taken out.
Charges have been placed. Area is secured.
Buenos Aires has a Fleet portal being controlled by corrupted S.H.I.E.L.D. agents.
There's a lot of seismic activity in the area...
You think they might have corrupted Quakes down there?
Now we just need to outfox all these Quakes.
And set the charges on the portal to go BOOM.
Cover me while I place the charges!
Team, you lost your operator. Fall back.
The final Fleet portal has been detected somewhere in the Himalayas.
Make your way through the mountains and find the portal before it's too late.
We should think about custom S.T.R.I.K.E. jackets and stuff.
My suit wasn't really designed for freezing cold weather.
Put it in the suggestion box.
The ground will run red with your blood by the end of this battle.
I'm picking up readings of a portal in that ancient structure ahead. Stand by.
Sure, we'll just stand around here until the next horde of ninjas sneaks up on us.
Here you go. I got ammo coming out my butt.
Not literally! You literally thought I had ammunition coming out of my butt?
I'm talking to an alien raccoon with a jet pack. Nothing fazes me anymore.
Ultimus is the only true master. I will destroy you in his honor.
You know, for a talking raccoon, you're not so bad.
You know, for a talking human, neither are you.
If we can shut down this last Fleet portal...
...it will cut off Ultimus's ability to move in giant fleets of Kree warships.
Cover me while I set the charges.
All of the Fleet portals around the globe have been closed.
Our operator has been taken out. Fall back.
Danny, Ultimus's forces have been sighted around the mystical entrance to K'un-Lun.
Ultimus must not be allowed to enter the city.
How did he find the entrance?
You're asking the wrong question, Mister Rand.
What does he want with K'un-Lun?
After we defeat these forces, I can re-seal the entrance to K'un-Lun.
Now we need to close the entrance to K'un-Lun.
I must seal the entrance to K'un-Lun.
Then we can figure out what Ultimus's purpose is here.
Protect me while I close the entrance to K'un-Lun.
We cannot complete the seal without Iron Fist. All is lost.
Yes, but Ultimus's forces were able to steal a valuable artifact from K'un-Lun.
The Wand of Watoomb was under their care. Now Ultimus has it.
What does Ultimus want with the wand?
I don't know. But it cannot be good.
Mr. Rand, thank you for coming to Wakanda.
Ultimus's forces came in the dead of night and stole the artifact we were charged to protect.
Yes. But we might be able to catch them before they escape.
Ultimus's forces are trying to escape with the Ka Stone.
Protect me while I close the portal.
Team, we lost Iron Fist. We cannot close the portal without him.
I closed the portal, but the Ka Stone was not with them.
Yes. He is acquiring a specific set of powerful, mystical artifacts.
I'm not sure. I need to consult the ancient texts.
I would not summon S.T.R.I.K.E. unless the situation was dire.
As the former leader of the Hand for centuries, I would expect not.
Since Ultimus replaced me with a brainwashed imposter...
...only a few of my minions follow me still.
When Ultimus took control of the Hand, he also took control of an artifact of great power.
The Siege Perilous. We must get it back.
What does he need the artifact for?
He said it was a key he needed for his ultimate goal. But he did not say more.
Then let's go get it back.
Proceed with caution. Our enemies are strong.
You're too late. No one can stop Ultimus now.
But they used the artifact to open a gateway to a nether realm.
Nobu, you must close the gateway before the demonic forces are freed.
Protect me, and it will be done.
Defend Nobu while he closes the gateway.
Nobu has fallen. We have failed.
Been wanting to test out my new weapons systems.
The gateway is sealed. But Ultimus still has the Siege Perilous.
That makes three powerful artifacts under his control.
We must discover why he is seeking these artifacts and stop him before it is too late.
Ultimus's forces are attacking the Sanctum Sanctorum.
They must not be allowed to break through.
We must defend the Sanctum from Ultimus's onslaught.
I'm rarely back on Earth, let alone New York City...
...and I scored Hamilton tickets for after this fight.
That seemed a bit too easy, right?
It was a diversion. A corrupted Mordo infiltrated the Sanctum during the fight.
He stole an ancient spellbook. The Darkhold.
And lowered all the magical barriers protecting the Sanctum itself.
I need you to defend Iron Fist while he re-establishes the mystical barriers protecting the Sanctum.
I've got his back, sorcerer. Time to get to work.
Provide protection while I re-establish the barriers around the Sanctum Sanctorum.
Iron Fist has fallen. Everyone fall back!
The Sanctum Sanctorum is protected again.
But Ultimus still got that book.
And we still don't know what he is planning to do with it.
Thor Odinson, I think I know what Ultimus is planning.
And I fear it will mean the end of this war.
If my theory is correct, he will be coming for a powerful artifact under your possession.
Because, wizard, a corrupted version of my brother Loki absconded with the item yesterday.
Do you know where they went?
You will not leave this battlefield with the Warlock's Eye.
I will chop all of you into equally small pieces!
They tricked us. The Warlock's Eye was never here.
And more foes will be unleashed by this gateway.
Thor, you must close the path to Asgard.
It will be done. But it will take all my focus.
I will be vulnerable while I seal the gateway. I will need your assistance.
Fools. None can withstand Ultimus's might.
Ultimus now possesses the five artifacts he needs.
What does he plan to do with them?
If I'm right, those artifacts are the keys to unlock a place of great power.
From there he can conquer all realities.
S.T.R.I.K.E.'s received communication from the Fallen Dimension's "smart" Hulk.
Their Banner stabilized the vaccine that prevents Ultimus's conversion process.
We have to manufacture the vaccine and administer it to every member of S.T.R.I.K.E.
A.I.M. has the perfect facility, but it is under Ultimus's control. I will be glad to reacquire it for the cause.
This mission is critical. I'm sending Iron Man as your backup.
Pleasure to be working with you again, Your Supreme-ness.
Let's keep things professional this time, Mr. Stark.
Aww, where's the fun in that?
We are at the facility. Clear the way, would you, Mr. Stark?
The path is clear, Supreme Lady.
Isn't it a little presumptuous to say you are the most "supreme" in all the sciences?
And you refer to yourself as Iron Man, yet you barely qualify.
It's true. My suit contains very little iron.
That wasn't the part I was referring to.
We need to take out these experiments while protecting Scientist Supreme!
PROTECT <color=#fff568>SCIENTIST SUPREME</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.
Adequate work, Mr. Stark. I'll be sure to forward you the charges to repair my suit.
Fall back! We need a medic at my position! NOW!
Ah, breathe in those chemicals! Well, on second thought, don't. They're highly toxic.
Supreme One, I am ready to begin the production of the vaccine.
We need to defend Scientist Supreme's assistant from enemy forces as she works on the vaccine.
The vaccine is complete. Prepare for inoculation.
Abort the mission! We can't use the A.I.M. lab now!
The vaccine is complete. Prepare for inoculation.
All VIPs and S.T.R.I.K.E. members have been given the vaccine.
Director Fury, you are the last one we need to inoculate.
Ultimus's forces are trying to take back the facility.
Looks like my checkup will have to wait.
Can't let the Director fall into enemy hands! Keep them at bay!
DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN THIS MISSION.
Director Fury and Scientist Supreme are down! We need evac! Now!
Sir, a portal from the Fallen Dimension has opened in Midtown.
I thought we took care of all those?
Whoever created this portal opened a floodgate. Take them out.
My apologies. I had to open a portal to your dimension to bring over my latest discovery.
No problem, Doctor Banner hyphen Hulk. Just try not to invite party crashers next time.
I think I might have found a way to actually REVERSE the effects of Ultimus's Conversion Engine.
We have to find the Conversion Engine and gain access to it.
We need to find the Conversion Engine in this dimension and gain access to it.
This dimension? There are multiple Conversion Engines?
There's a unique one built in each dimension. We need to triangulate its location to get the information I need to reverse its effects.
The devices are set. Trying to locate the warship where the Conversion Engine is will draw out Ultimus's forces. Be ready.
I have the location of the Conversion Warship.
Now that we know where Ultimus is housing his Conversion Engine in this dimension, we can plan our attack.
Already on it. S.T.R.I.K.E. team on the way.
Without a plan? I was hoping the Tony Stark in this dimension was not quite as rash.
Don't know what I was thinking.
Ronan and Korath are defending the Conversion Engine. Let's do this.
Now we just need to acquire the data from the Conversion Engine.
We must protect the operator while we access the data from the Conversion Engine.
Should be fine. Nothing Ultimus has thrown at us has stopped us yet.
The Conversion Engine is usually guarded by Ultimus's Hulk Squad.
We must protect the operator until the download is complete.
We lost contact with the team. It's over.
Sending an evacuation pod. Hold out until it arrives.
Easy for you to say, Fury!
You don't have half of the Kree army on your tail!
Defend the operator until the pod arrives.
SURVIVE WITH THE <color=#fff568>OPERATOR</color> TO WIN THIS MISSION.
Did you get the data you needed to work on reversing the effects of the Conversion Engine?
I think so. I will keep you updated on my progress.
We lost the signal. It's too late.
Transmission received. Evacuation pod is on its way.
Pod is taking fire and performing evasive maneuvers.
Commander of S.T.R.I.K.E., this is your final warning.
Reveal the location of the Nexus of All Realities to me and surrender your forces...
Or I will decimate the populations of Earth's major cities. One at a time.
You had your opportunity to join me...
Now you only have one choice:
Strange, what is Ultimus talking about?
The entrance to the Nexus is somewhere on Earth.
Ultimus has the 5 keys he needs to open the path.
But he doesn't know where the entrance is.
Commander, picking up a large enemy force headed towards the Helicarrier.
You should have listened to Ultimus while you still had the chance. Boys, rip this place apart.
We can't hold them off! We have to get everyone off the Helicarrier now.
Ultimus is bombarding us from all directions here in Spain. I'm not sure how long we can hold out.
We can't. Time to evacuate. Take a Quinjet and get out of here.
Stark, I hate it when you're right, but not much of a choice at this point. Save as many as you can.
Clint, grab a Quinjet and let me know when you can get these folks out of here.
PROTECT THE <color=#fff568>CIVILIANS</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.
Tony, Quinjet incoming. Let's get out of here.
Alright, we're clear. But I'm getting chatter about an attack at a crisis summit in Rome.
Sounds like corrupted Hydra forces are threatening to blow the place sky high.
I'll reroute S.T.R.I.K.E. resources over there. We have to save those world leaders.
We have a message from Ultimus. The world will pay as long as S.T.R.I.K.E. resists!
We need to take out those operators before they set those charges.
We need to stop them. We are running out of time.
They're setting off the explosives. We're too late.
Ultimus's Hand and A.I.M. forces are invading Rio de Janeiro.
We need to help evacuate civilians in the area to prevent them from being enslaved by Ultimus.
Just point me in the right direction. I'm gettin' good at saving humans.
Check this out, boy. Time to show you how a real arrow works.
Whistling? Really? Cheat if you have to, but all I need is a bow.
PROTECT THE <color=#fff568>CIVILIANS</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.
Dang it. We couldn't save those folks.
Alright, you've got some serious skills with that stick and string. Let's call it a draw.
Ultimus's forces are hunting us down. We need to go underground.
Natasha, take your team and go dark.
Get past Ultimus's patrols and regroup at the rendezvous.
What about the forces invading the cities around the world?
We're no good to them if we get captured. You taught me that.
But without us defending them, millions will be corrupted.
We have to assume all of Earth is under Ultimus's control now.
We need to come up with a plan to take it back.
This will be your last stand here and now. You should feel honored to die by my hand.
Ultimus's reinforcements are inbound. We can't hold them off for long.
Ok, I think we can take a breather here.
Scratch that idea, here they come. Get ready for a fight.
You are surrounded and have nowhere to escape. Surrender to Ultimus now or die.
Not much of a choice. Sounds like it's time to make a last stand.
That's the last of them. Time to regroup. Back to the Quinjet!
Natasha, got any good news for us?
Not even a little. The entire United States has been overrun by Ultimus's forces.
The United States? That's the town Peter's from. Is it an important Earth city?
We need a new plan. We can't keep running forever.
This area belongs to Ultimus. Give up now while you still have your breath.
I think I know a way we can innoculate the area from Ultimus's corruption.
But we need to get ahold of Captain America.
Cap, did you secure the crate of the corruption vaccine?
Sure did. We're ready to administer it to the general population. What's the plan?
Bruce, corrupted S.H.I.E.L.D. forces have taken control of the Hoover Dam.
Cover me while I release the vaccine into the water supply. This will protect millions of people.
They took out Natasha. We need to regroup.
The vaccine is in the water supply. Millions of people will be innoculated from Ultimus's corruption.
Fury, Ultimus has taken control of most of the planet.
S.T.R.I.K.E. teams are being systematically hunted down.
Strange, are we any closer to finding the entrance to the Nexus of All Realities?
Getting closer. But the good news is that Ultimus has not found it yet, either.
It's clear we're not going to win this war without help.
Any chance you have found new allies in alternate dimensions yet?
There is a S.H.I.E.L.D. Resistance force fighting a dimension controlled by Hydra, along with a dimension ruled by God King Thor.
They might come to our aid.
Ultimus's forces have found us again. Time to scramble.
After we take out these forces, we need to fall back to the next hideout.
Fury, I've found the location to the Nexus of All Realities.
Great. Now what do we do with it?
Don't think I heard you right. Isn't that what we've been trying to avoid?
It was. But getting Ultimus to go through the portal into the Nexus...
Might be the only chance we have left to defeat him.
Ultimus has established control in every major region across the world.
If he finds the gateway to the Nexus of All Realities, he will be unstoppable.
Why is this Nexus thing so important again?
If Ultimus gets inside the Nexus of All Realities, he will have access to every dimension as well as control of all space and time.
We need to take out his leaders in every region to slow him down.
Let's start with the corrupted Elektra in her African compound.
I guess it WOULD be too obvious to have an evil Black Panther ruling the region in our dimension.
Any word from our mystical interdimensional recruiter?
Doctor Strange has made contact with a dimension ruled by an all-powerful version of Vision.
He has agreed to help us take down Ultimus's leaders.
Hold up, do I have to take orders from some Lawnmower Man version of my former assistant?
We're working alongside our allies, Stark. Not for them.
Just be sure to limit its security clearance.
Just to be clear, I'm in charge of this operation, Jarvis... Vision... Jarv-Vis.
I have transcended beyond the need to exert my dominance over others merely to satiate my ego.
I think you just agreed and insulted me at the same time.
THIS <color=#fff568>PUNISHER</color> USES HIS ULTIMATE ATTACK EVERY TURN.
I have confirmation that Elektra is on her Helicarrier up ahead.
We must eliminate her before she can escape.
Vision, we need to take back this Helicarrier and take down Elektra.
I believe you are mistaking me with the subservient version of myself from your dimension.
The Vision I know isn't subservient. He's selfless.
Records indicate that he defers to your plans, even though he knows they are flawed.
Yeah, it's called trust. \nIt goes both ways.
Or faith... so very human. \nVery well, then. After you.
I have sworn to protect this territory for Ultimus with my life.
I admit it, I'm a little jealous of Ultimus.
I can't even get my assistant to get my coffee order right.
Having this Helicarrier will give us a fighting chance. Four more targets to go.
Corrupted Kingpin is running operations for Ultimus in Hong Kong.
We need to remove him from power to establish a foothold in the region.
Fury needs my help with some top secret S.H.I.E.L.D. stuff.
You ready to take off the training wheels and do this one without me?
I govern and maintain the lives of over 9 trillion beings in my dimension.
Just checking. Don't blow a gasket.
Glad you're here. Been hoping to take my aggression out on some heroes.
Corrupted Kingpin is up ahead. We must disrupt his operations before it is too late.
Hey Vision, you've got, like, major superior intelligence, right?
By human standards, my Intelligence Quotient is quite high.
So then you MUST know what S.T.R.I.K.E. stands for.
Of course I do. \nIt's in the training manual.
I am in charge of this territory. You will not be taking away what I have earned.
Kingpin has been removed. On to the next territory.
My forces have driven the corrupted Kingpin out of Hong Kong.
I will take care of Baron Mordo. \nHe has established a base in Transylvania.
I prefer to reference locations by their mystical names.
I know a mystical place where you can take that attitude.
Can't you just magic us to the back of the castle where Mordo is?
No. Mordo has set up magical barriers everywhere.
We'll have to fight through to him the old-fashioned way.
That's the last of them. Mordo's study is at the back of his castle.
Does he keep his coffin back there, too? Away from any direct sunlight and wreaths of garlic?
Also, wasn't this Count Dracula's castle? Which one is higher rank... Count or Baron?
Careful, Stark. Don't make me turn you back into a rat and erase your memory again.
See! I told you, Strange. This guy thinks he's a vampire.
Mordo is vanquished. Three down, two to go. The Inner Circle is starting to crumble.
Time to bring the fight to Washington D.C. to begin coordinated attacks on Ultimus there.
Corrupted Hydra and Ultron forces have been entrenched there for weeks now.
It's about time we pushed them out of there for good.
This land is under the control of Ultimus's Hydra forces. Prepare for your end.
I have had it with all these snakes on this dimensional plane!
That's one less viper's nest to worry about. Now we take on Red Skull.
Once we take out this corrupted Red Skull, the U.S. will be free again.
You're starting to sound like a real patriot there, Stark.
Iron Patriot? Not really my thing.
After more than seventy years in exile on Vormir, Ultimus has honored me with this noble task.
We have finally conquered the U.S. in the name of Hydra... and Ultimus.
Oh, this is going to feel good.
THIS <color=#fff568>RED SKULL</color> CAN SUMMON EVERY OTHER TURN.
Hydra has been eliminated from Washington, time to find that last lieutenant before he goes into hiding.
Tony, I need you to take a team to Vancouver and take out Ultimus's last lieutenant.
Great. That guy's claws will rip through my armor like a can opener.
That's why you're taking a full squad.
Shouldn't have come, bub. Can't let you leave alive.
THIS <color=#fff568>WOLVERINE</color> HAS A SUPERCHARGED HEALING FACTOR AND RESISTANCES.
Overthrowing Ultimus's lieutenants ought to cripple his operations in the near term.
And he still has yet to find the entrance to the Nexus of All Realities.
We'll keep at it. Ancient texts haven't given us much to work with thus far.
The more allies we bring into this fight, the better our chances of keeping Ultimus from finding the gateway.
In the meantime, we need to find other ways to debilitate Ultimus.
Got anything new we can work with?
I've been studying the schematics we stole from Ultimus's Conversion Engine, and I think I found a way to exploit the device.
The machine is attuned to bend the subject's will to Ultimus's.
You figure that out all by yourself, did you?
ANY Ultimus, you idiot. Including the Ultimus from our dimension.
If we can get our Ultimus inside the Conversion Engine, we could switch the corrupted's control to OUR Ultimus's will.
I can't see how that plan could POSSIBLY go wrong. Oh wait, let me do the math again...
You have any better ideas, Stark?
Director Quake, nice to finally have you here in our neck of the woods.
Happy to be here, Director Fury.
We're hoping you'll lead the operation to secure an Ultimus controlled safehouse.
Sounds like a plan. What's the target?
The device has a unique digital signature that's been refreshed since we last managed to access it. As a result, we don't know where it is.
If we can secure any of the data that stores the new digital signature, we can use it to find the device.
Exactly. Defenses will be heavy so we need to be careful to avoid letting them destroy the data.
Huh... This crew is definitely more interesting than the teams I'm used to working with...
If you think Groot & Rocket are extraordinary, wait until you meet Deadpool.
On second thought, maybe it's best for you to NOT talk to Deadpool...
Looks like we've got Hand soldiers and Ultron bots on patrol in the area.
Good. I've been wanting to try out some combination incendiary EMP rounds I made.
Roasting ninjas and shocking robots at once? While we're at it, I'll slow them down for you too.
Clint, we've got a situation up ahead just outside the safehouse. Readings show it's a stealth squad. Need those eyes of yours.
I swear, every time, they think they can hide from me. Hasn't worked even once.
Bad news. Looks like we're too late. The lab's been wiped clean already.
Not so fast. I'm still getting readings of activity in their server room.
No time to waste, we need that data.
Welcome members of S.T.R.I.K.E., but unfortunately for you...
I recognize these systems. They need his biometric signature to finish the system wipe.
We must take out Fury before they can wipe the servers!
DEFEAT <color=#fff568>NICK FURY</color> TO WIN THIS MISSION.
They're linking all critical data paths together.
Final administrative privileges bypassed. We need to hurry.
Fury has provided them with his biometric signature. We're too late.
Their Fury is down. We can still recover the data off those drives now.
We recovered the data we need to track down the signature of Ultimus's conversion engine.
Good, because we need to lift off ASAP. Ultimus has sent a Punisher-led hit squad to take us down.
Squad, do not let this Helicarrier take off. Ultimus demands that we take it down at all costs.
Rocket, we need to start searching for the new conversion engine ASAP. Get on it.
I've got the conversion engine's new signature, but the search beacon is taking longer than expected to set up.
We'll cover you while you get it up and running. Get it done.
Rocket, we'll hold them off as long as we can. Work your magic.
Ok, I've got the beacon hooked up. Finally! Booting it up now.
The search is indicating the conversion engine is on an island called Australia.
They took out Rocket. Fall back!
Search complete. The device is in the city of Brisbane.
Rocket, you fuzzy genius, you did it!
Ok, that's the last time you can ever call me fuzzy. Deal?
My readings are telling me that the conversion engine is going through it's final diagnostic checks on that docked Kree warship up ahead.
Australia! This place is amazing, don't you think?
Yeah, sure it is, I guess. But seriously, what's your deal Bullseye? Why do you like Australia so much?
Great beaches, great coffee, barbecue... What's not to like?
For starters? It's on a planet that always seems to be on the brink of destruction at the hands of a bunch of psychos.
Oh good. More cattle to slaughter for Ultimus.
I can't say I miss working with that goon. S.T.R.I.K.E. team, let's make this quick.
Time to get on that warship before they can take off. This is our last chance to get to the device!
Director Fury, things have gotten a little more complicated.
My readings indicate that corrupted forces are attempting to induce a mass overload of the conversion engine.
That is NOT good. If they can pull it off, they'd be able to send a corruption pulse wave that would hit everyone in the galaxy.
In other words, corrupting everyone that's left in one fell swoop.
We need to get our Ultimus over to that infernal machine and scramble it before they can pull this off.
Ultimus. This is your chance to save your people from the menace that wears your face. You in?
Protect our Ultimus at all costs. We can't risk losing him now.
PROTECT <color=#fff568>ULTIMUS</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.
They took out our Ultimus. We're finished...
The conversion engine is up ahead. They almost have it calibrated! Get in there.
As long as we can stop their Operators from overloading the conversion engine, we can get our Ultimus into the device and recalibrate it.
So if we're lucky, this thing will either scramble the system and disrupt his corrupted forces, or it will give a devoted super army to Nexus Ultimus.
Yes. As for the probability of one outcome over another, we have no calculations that suggest one is more likely than the other. It's a mystery!
Rocket. If at any point when calibrating the device this thing starts to go sideways... You know what you have to do.
One step ahead of you chief...
Those Kree Operators are beginning the overload procedure on the conversion engine!
Not if I have anything to say about it...
Their power supplies are all fully charged. Take out the Operators.
They are almost done configuring the conversion engine. Focus on their Operators!
They are activating all broadcast channels. We are running out of time!
We did it! Now it's time to work my magic...
I am entrusting you to see this through, Raccoon. Have faith in me as I do in you.
We're a team. Don't worry about it.
I've got the explosives planted in case things go south and he turns on us.
You never can trust those Eternals completely... Right?
Of course not. One must always be prepared with a contingency plan.
Team, you gotta watch my back while I finish activating this thing.
Ah yes, I see you brought your Ultimus. I have heard he is soft and pathetic.
I will relish ending you all here and now.
Oh man, this situation just got a lot more tricky. Cover me!
Rebooting of the conversion engine is complete.
Calibrating the device to our Ultimus's genetic signature.
Ok, I'm activating all broadcast channels. Almost there!
Ok, activating the conversion engine, here goes nothing...
Excellent work, Rocket. The device has been scrambled and all those affected by the device appear to be incapacitated. Just as I predicted!
Right. Just as you predicted. Sure. Let's high tail it outta here with OUR Ultimus before big baddie Ultimus wakes from his corruption hangover.
I can't believe that actually worked! Maybe the momentum has finally shifted in our favor.
Perhaps. But a wounded Ultimus might turn out to be more dangerous than before.
This fight is far from over. We need to find the Nexus before he does. Nothing else matters now.
Ultimus has gone into hiding and we're still waiting to hear from Doctor Strange and Mordo.
T'Challa, I'm hoping you can help S.T.R.I.K.E. track down a mysterious signal coming from a beacon somwhere in the ruins of Sokovia.
Somebody out there may be trying to reach us and we can't risk Ultimus getting his hands on it.
I'll put together a team right away.
Mr. Rand, analysis has revealed the signal to be of a mystic origin. Help us decipher it if you can.
It's time we put an end to Ultimus once and for all. I will not fail.
We must get to the beacon before Ultimus's forces can find it.
Too late. We need to intercept this squad and take them down.
I can sense that my fist can open this. But I will need time to prepare the ritual.
Let's get this back to the Helicarrier straight away.
Are you sure you know what you're doing?
By the power of the iron fist, I compell you to open...
Yeah, so why are there five of you standing in front of us?
We are members of the Strange Society.
We have arrived to this time and dimension as now is the opportune time to seal Ultimus away in the Nexus of all Realities.
Well, it'll have to wait as we're still waiting on you and Mordo to show up with the 5 objects of power.
Ugh, why do I know this...
Ms. Jones, now is not the time to lose focus. Ultimus has begun an attack on the Helicarrier.
Listen up Stranges. Stay back while we beat the crap of these guys. We've got this.
They took out all the Strange Society. Fall back!
More of Ultimus's forces are incoming. Get ready.
T'Challa, if you can hold them off, we can focus on finding Ultimus's current whereabouts.
Do what you must. We will fight them back.
Ultimus cannot be stopped. Prepare yourselves for oblivion!
We have located Ultimus, but the situation is a bit tricky...
Alrightly Doctors Strange, lay it on us. No need to dumb it down for us.
Ultimus is currently under the protection of a mystical barrier that a corrupted Iron Fist has constructed.
It defies all time and space and is unbreakable without knowing the specific ritual that was used.
Ok, sounds easy enough. We just need to find this corrupted Iron Fist and learn his ritual.
It's a bit more...complicated than that, but yes.
I'm sure it is. That's why you're the experts on multidimensional time and space hibbajabba. Let's mosey, shall we?
If they get a message out to their Iron Fist, he will escape before we can get to him.
Shouldn't be a problem. Taking out enemy operators happens to be a specialty of mine.
Time to take down those operators. No time like the present.
Come on team, focus on their operators.
We're running out of time. Take the operators out!
They got their message off to Iron Fist. He's in the wind now.
Tony, good work. Their Iron Fist won't be expecting us.
Gamora, we could use your expertise here. How about you clear a path for us?
Believe me, the pleasure is all mine.
Hand and Hydra forces on patrol, should be easy enough.
If we move quickly, they won't even see us coming.
Area is secured. The corrupted Iron Fist is up ahead.
One step closer to opening Ultimus's impervious barrier.
Any special strategies we need to use when dealing with this Iron Fist?
This Iron Fist is exceptionally powerful. Avoid the fury of his fist at all costs.
It will be an honor to present what's left of your corpses to Ultimus as tribute.
This Iron Fist was no match for us. Now we shall extract what we need from him.
It looks like we came back at just the right time.
Indeed. We have all 5 objects of power and are prepared to do what must be done.
Welcome Doctor. We are the Strange Society and we have come to help seal Ultimus away in the Nexus of All Realities.
Excellent. Your power combined with our will make this ritual possible.
My sources have confirmed Ultimus is on the move.
He's headed for the apex site to open the door to the Nexus from this side.
We'll cover you while we make our way to the ritual site.
Destroyer of Worlds, as long as we can open the door from the other side with they keys you have obtained, this should work.
Ultimus has forces blocking the path to the ritual site.
Time to make them wish they weren't on this rock.
We're clear. No time to waste. We must begin our ritual now.
We must open the portal to the Nexus of All Realities. We are out of time.
We'll cover you. Get it done.
Ultimus will throw everything he's got at you. We must concentrate to make this succeed.
We've got this. Focus on the ritual, we'll take them down.
All 5 objects of power are in place.
Making the connection to the Nexus of All Realities.
We've lost The Strange Society. We've failed.
Something is off. I don't think our plan is going to work.
Ultimus is not going through his gateway. If we can't coax him through, this will not work.
I have arrived once again in your time of need. Allow Thor the God King to help him through the gate.
So you planned to trap me inside the Nexus of All Realities?
A bold plan. But ill conceived. I will defeat you here and now before stepping through to my paradise.
Actually, it will be your tomb once we've crushed you and thrown your battered body inside. Be prepared.
DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ULTIMUS</color> TO SAVE THE MULTIVERSE ONCE AND FOR ALL!
You think you have defeated me...but this will not be the last you'll see of me.
Yeah, keep telling yourself that. Enjoy your time spent forever in oblivion.
Don't let the portal hit your ass on the way out.
I suppose you want S.H.I.E.L.D. back now?
Tony, you've know, you've done some excellent work with S.H.I.E.L.D. in my absence.
Thanks to you and the team, we managed to roll a perfect S.T.R.I.K.E., wouldn't you say?
Just got word that Ultimus has a bunch of his Kree cronies near one of those interdimensional portals.
Wanna go mess 'em up with me?
Never met a Kree I didn't end up having to stab anyway. Count me in.
Yeah, you're right, it probably is a trap. But we gotta do this. Can't risk Ultimus having a portal.
This portal belongs to Ultimus, our one true master. Surrender or we will put you down.
You dare challenge the will of Ultimus? Your judgement is now at hand.
You have put up a worthy fight, but your efforts will end here and now. \nSubmit to my will or be destroyed...
Everything with you is SO melodramatic. Let's see how tough you are after THIS!
Looks like you guys could use a little support. Allow me.
Thanks for the assist, Avengers. Ultimus won't be using this portal anytime soon.
What do you want, Kree hunter? The Kree Empire has pledged its loyalty to Ultimus.
We are now sworn enemies in this war.
I come in peace, Asgardian. I am part of a resistance movement within the Kree.
Ultimus promised that the Kree would rule our dimension.
He did not mention it would be ruled under his iron fist.
Ultimus is mad with power. His first act as ruler was to destroy the Supreme Intelligence.
Ronan the Accuser led a Kree rebellion until he was captured.
If we can free Ronan from Ultimus's prison before he is corrupted, the Kree Resistance will join with S.T.R.I.K.E.
The Kree could be a valuable ally in the war. We will help you free Ronan.
These corrupted will not stand between us and our goal.
Ronan is being held near here. We must move quickly.
Ultimus is keeping Ronan on this planet.
An army of heathen Ravagers guards the area. Be wary.
We will strike them down where they stand.
They've taken out our allies. We must fall back.
Now we just need to find out where Ronan is being held.
Ronan could be anywhere on this planet.
My Kree tracker can pinpoint his location given enough time.
I can pinpoint Ronan's location with this device.
Triangulating Ronan's location to within 3 kilometers.
Location now within a 500 meter radius.
They've defeated our operator. Let's regroup.
Ronan is being converted on a docked Kree Warship up ahead.
This warship is where Ronan is being held.
We must make haste and dispatch with the guards quickly.
There's no way you're taking Ronan back from Ultimus.
The Conversion Engine is just up ahead. Let's move.
Ronan is already in the conversion chamber. We must hurry.
We will free your ally. Fear not.
So Korath found us already, huh? That guy is such a pain in the tail! Well, let's do this.
They are starting the conversion process on Ronan.
We must stop their operators before it is too late.
We are running out of time. Stop the operators.
We're too late. Ronan is lost to us.
You were wise to come to my aid. Kree vengeance will be swift.
We must gain access to the Supreme Intelligence. It will help us overthrow Ultimus and--
Ultimus has destroyed the Supreme Intelligence. You are the only free leader of the Kree left.
Then we must gather our forces quickly.
Ultimus will pay for subverting the Kree Empire.
I will purge the galaxy of this false idol and scatter his ashes to the solar winds.
THIS is why you are destined to be the next leader of the Kree Resistance.
You have taken what belongs to Ultimus. Submit or die.
Now we must find a way off this accursed planet.
My people will rally to my call. Ultimus must face judgment.
They need only learn the truth, and they will rise up in arms.
This planet is home to a long-range communications transmitter.
Take the transmitter, and I will send the word of truth to every corner of the empire.
It appears our plan must wait. I sense a growing storm on the horizon.
Ultimus has sent the Thors and Hulks of conquered dimensions to stop us.
You are not true Sons of Odin. You have betrayed Asgard, and you shall pay.
Crush these heretics, and I will broadcast the message to my people.
But be prepared for a fight.
Ultimus has sent corrupted versions of you to stop us.
You all stand accused of defying Ultimus!
We cannot hold back Ultimus's forces for long.
Defend my operator while the signal is sent.
Filthy Kree. It is my destiny to destroy you in Ultimus's name.
Defend me while I broadcast Ronan's message.
Starting up the signal enhancement generators.
Tracking down all Kree broadcast towers.
They've defeated our operator. We have failed.
The message is sent. A call to arms to rise up against Ultimus.
The Kree Resistance will join S.T.R.I.K.E. in your war against this usurper.
With the liberated Kree at our side, we might turn the tide of this battle.
True. We have just ignited a Kree civil war.
Peace will not come until all Kree are united as one.
And that cannot happen until Ultimus falls.
We have located Ultimus's energy station that powers his massive portals.
It is on the planet Contraxia.
Contraxia? That ice ball is full of outlaws, Ravagers, and mercenaries.
Which is why the Commander wishes us to lead a cosmic S.T.R.I.K.E. team to the planet...
Ravagers. Shocker. Let's light it up!
The energy fortress should be up ahead.
Drax, we have to take out this patrol before they alert the entire base.
I do not keep anything DOWN or LOW. But I will swiftly vanquish these enemies.
We must take out their operators, or they will alert the entire fortress.
We need to stop their operators.
We are running out of time. Stop their operators.
It's too late. We must retreat.
Defeating these guards is the only way to get into the station and destroy it.
But I am Drax, not Obvious.
And I am not a captain.
The energy station control room is up ahead.
Combing through the systems here. It looks like Ultimus has a Scientist Supreme running the show.
Totally. I would NOT want to be on her bad side.
You fools. Did you not think I had calculated every possible way you might attempt to stop me?
Your calculations are no match for my Hammer, Scientist. Step aside, or feel my wrath.
We must press on deeper into the fortress.
It appears that Scientist Supreme has deployed Ultrons to stop us.
These soulless automatons are no match for my blades.
Well put, Drax the Destroyer. Attack!
Uh... that's a lot of robots...
We must find access to the control room to destroy the weapon.
This corrupted Yondu holds the security key that will give us access to the engineering control room.
Yondu loves me. Let me handle this.
Peter, every corrupted version of Yondu we encounter tries to kill you.
Big mistake showing up here, kid. I'm afraid we're going to have to kill y'all.
Yondu is vanquished. Grab his key and press onward.
You guys need to cover me while I set the explosives to blow this place sky high.
We do not need to destroy this place to the sky. Only destroy it.
Yeah, Groot. Maybe his mom DID drop him on his head as a baby.
Cover me, guys. I need all the time you can give me!
Gaining access to the base's reactors.
Planting the worm to take control of the reactors.
Disabling all failsafe controls on the reactors.
We're all set. Time to get out of here!
We must make haste and flee before the fortress explodes.
Let's go, people. You snooze, you lose.
I do not intend to sleep nor admit defeat at a time like this.
Stop them! Don't let them out of here alive!
As expected, I did not sleep, and so I was victorious!
We must hurry. The fortress is about to explode.
We're almost clear! Well, except for that massive force standing right in the path of our ship.
You will never make it off this planet alive.
Destroying Ultimus's energy station prevents him from transporting more troops into this dimension.
Now we must rally the Kree Resistance and take back their home planet.
Could we, like, do that tomorrow? This hero stuff is pretty exhausting.
There is no time to spare, Star-Lord. Every second we waste, Ultimus grows stronger.
Fine. Better get to it then. But you owe me a drink when this is all done.
If we survive, we shall share a drink of the finest Asgardian ale.
Loki, you know I would not come to you unless the situation was dire.
Flattery will get you nowhere, brother.
We need your help infiltrating Hala, the Kree home world, and overthrowing Ultimus's forces there.
The task requires deception, stealth, and trickery. I know of no one better than you at these things.
You're going to make me blush.
Really? Because I had prepared a grand speech about loyalty and "doing the right thing" and--
For you to be indebted to me is reward enough.
Follow me. I think I know a way for us to enter the planet undetected.
If we take out the guards of this warship, I can disguise us as the crew.
It should get us onto the Kree planet undetected.
Getting aboard is the easy part. Making it to Hala without being discovered is another matter.
Convincing the Kree to rebel against Ultimus will not be easy.
We have Ronan the Accuser leading the rebellion. He is well-respected among the Kree.
Would be far easier for me to masquerade as their leader and lead the rebellion.
Let's worry about clearing out this section of the warship first. Global conquest through deception second.
You will ALL become children of Ultimus soon.
The Kree home world approaches. If we secure the bridge of the ship, we should arrive safely.
It seems Ultimus put a corrupted Spider-Man in charge of this ship.
Take him out, and I can appear as him to take control of the ship.
Very well. Let's get this unsavory business over with.
Ultimus put me in charge of this ship. No way I'm handing it over to you guys.
Now I simply don Spider-Man's likeness and...
...we land on the planet safely under Ultimus's flag.
And none too soon. This deception makes my skin crawl.
Ultimus has gathered the Kree who have rebelled against him in an internment camp.
If we free them before they are converted, the revolution will spill out into the streets of the capital.
Sowing chaos and confusion? You're starting to think like me, brother.
We must quickly take out the patrol guarding the internment camp.
Easy work. Now to release the prisoners.
The raccoon can access the security gates and release the prisoners remotely.
And you let me wear your helmet when this is done.
What? No. Just do your job, vermin.
We must protect Rocket while he disables the prison security grid.
Gaining access to security controls through back door channels.
Replacing all security camera footage with empty loop footage.
Disabling backup generators for security lockdown procedures.
They've taken out Rocket. Fall back!
Job's done! Now gimme that helmet.
No. And kindly release my leg.
Now this is interesting. The director of this facility is none other than a corrupted version of myself!
Blessed Odin! Does that mean I get to beat you up while you watch?
It's always been a dream of mine.
Yes. There's that. But more importantly--
After we replace him, I can use my DNA access to disable the planetary defense grid.
Ronan's invasion force can land on the planet undetected.
Should have known that S.T.R.I.K.E. would send ME to try to usurp me.
We are the most natural choice.
I agree. Seeing Ronan's invasion fleet take the capital was impressive.
I was speaking about the part where a corrupted version of you was pummeled into submission.
We have driven Ultimus's forces out of the capital.
Now we must press the attack and drive the corrupted off the planet.
We are indebted to you, Loki. But there is still a war to be won.
Ultimus is launching a counterattack with his Ultron forces.
Drive them back. Soon they will have no choice but to flee the planet.
Ultimus's forces have fallen back to one last outpost.
We win this next fight, and Hala is ours.
The Kree home world is ours. Ultimus's forces have abandoned the planet.
Uh, guys? I'm picking up dark matter signatures coming from an outpost in the north.
I thought we took out all of Ultimus's forces.
If they detonate a dark matter bomb, it will take out the entire planet.
Then what are we doing standing around here for?
We must stop the operators before they detonate the bomb.
We must hurry. They are arming the charges.
There is no time to waste!
The charges have been activated. They are about to detonate the--
The Kree Resistance control Hala once more. Safe from Ultimus the Usurper.
Now we must find a way to drive Ultimus out of this dimension entirely.
Aye, Star-Lord. Then the revels commence.
Fury, I've discovered the true reason Ultimus needs our dimension so badly.
Ours is the closest to a mystical plane known as--
Once Ultimus gains access to it, he can conquer any dimension he chooses.
He needs five ancient artifacts to unlock the path to the Nexus.
So we stop him from getting those artifacts.
Too late. He already has them.
Ultimus has the keys, but he hasn't found the door yet.
The entrance to the Nexus of All Realities is somewhere on Earth.
I'm still waiting for the good news.
I know a way to travel between dimensions without using Ultimus's portals.
I can take a team of mystics to acquire versions of the artifacts from dimensions Ultimus has yet to invade.
We might be able to get to the Nexus before Ultimus and prevent him from entering.
Do what you have to, Strange. We have to stop Ultimus.
The first artifact we need is known as the Ka Stone. I found a dimension where it exists.
Unfortunately, the dimension is ruled by the God of Deception, Loki.
You trespass on the Trickster God's domain. Be prepared to feel Loki's wrath.
We must fight our way to safety and then locate the Ka Stone.
Protect me while I search the astral plane for the location of the Ka Stone.
This sort of power should never have fallen into the hands of a miscreant like Loki.
All the more reason for us to take it from him.
You dare defile our Loki's sacred space. You will pay in blood.
Beginning my search throughout this realm.
I've almost got it. Hang on.
We cannot proceed without Strange. We must retreat.
I have found the Ka Stone. Loki's palace is just up ahead.
Loki will have the Ka Stone in his possession.
Once we retrieve the Stone, we should use it to wipe out this entire dimension.
We take the Ka Stone and leave. We have disrupted the natural order of this dimension too much already.
Rogues trying to steal my Ka Stone? \nI think not.
We have the Ka Stone. I will guide us to our next destination.
This next dimension is a lawless wasteland.
The land is divided between the warlords Kingpin and Nobu.
Which one has the Wand of Watoomb?
We don't know for certain. Where would you prefer to begin?
Beating up the Hand or beating up Kingpin?
That's like choosing between candy and chocolate.
We'll start with Fisk. If he doesn't have it, you'll get your chance to defeat Nobu.
This is the Kingpin's territory. Trespassers are shot on sight.
Kingpin's stronghold should be up ahead. Hopefully he possesses the Wand.
Kingpin is a natural born warlord. He will be well-protected.
Who wants to bet the Wand of Watoomb is the key to his power?
We have to act fast before they call for reinforcements.
Kingpin pays triple for people with capes! Tag 'em and bag 'em.
Take them down before they call in support!
We're trapped! They've got us surrounded!
Kingpin's penthouse is up ahead. Let's go pay him a visit.
Warlord Kingpin, huh? This should be interesting.
He'll be more lethal than the Kingpin on our Earth. The Wand of Watoomb is exceptionally powerful.
We must keep our focus on him if we have any hope of defeating him and taking the object for ourselves.
Impressive that you made it this far. Unfortunately, this is the end of the road for you.
I have secured the Wand of Watoomb. On to the next dimension.
The next artifact is the ancient tome, the Darkhold.
That is quite dangerous. In the wrong hands, the Darkhold could wreak havoc.
You have my support in seeking it out.
Thank you, T'Challa. I know where the Darkhold is, but...
It's in a dimension ruled by an evil Baron Mordo.
We have faced off several times, but this Mordo will be more powerful with the Darkhold.
Fear not. Together we will best him and take back the Darkhold.
Sorcery is forbidden without express consent from our supreme leader, Baron Mordo. Surrender or die.
I've always found this dimension to be particularly oppressive. That's the handywork of Mordo for you.
In order to get anywhere near Mordo in this world, we have to first get past his elite bodyguards.
They call themselves the Sisterhood. All women of exceptional fighting prowess.
We must take out their operators before they seal off Mordo's throne room. Let's make this quick.
You guys picked the wrong crew to mess with.
The ritual is growing in strength. Hurry up!
They've almost got the barrier up!
They completed the spell. There's no way to reach Mordo now.
Mordo is up ahead. Proceed with caution.
He has the Darkhold in his possession. Expect a tough fight.
If we take out Mordo, his power over the others will wane. Defeating him is the key.
Strange, you should not have come.
Just hand over the Darkhold and my stay will be extremely short, I assure you.
DEFEAT <color=#fff568>BARON MORDO</color> TO WIN THIS MISSION.
We have acquired three of the five objects of power.
Now we need to secure the Warlock's Eye and the Siege Perilous to open the Nexus.
I found a version of the Siege Perilous in a dimension that has been overrun by Hydra.
An entire dimension ruled by Hydra? Sounds pleasant.
The next mystical item we need to open the Nexus is the Siege Perilous.
The closest dimension where it exists is ruled by Hydra.
I'll lead a team of mystics to that dimension to retrieve the Siege Perilous.
An entire dimension ruled by Hydra? Sounds like my worst nightmare.
Worse than an interdimensional invasion of corrupted versions of ourselves?
We have him cornered. Hail Hydra!
This dimension's Hawkeye needs our help. And we could use a guide.
PROTECT <color=#fff568>HAWKEYE</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.
Thanks for the assist. The S.H.I.E.L.D. Resistance is in your debt.
Hawkeye, I don't have time for lengthy exposition. Here's the situation:
We come from an alternate dimension. We're here to steal the Siege Perilous from Hydra. Can you help us?
Uh, nice to meet you, too.
That artifact you mentioned, the Siege Perilous, is the source of Red Skull's power in our world.
If you can get it from them, the S.H.I.E.L.D. Resistance will have a shot at overthrowing Hydra.
Help me get past the Hydra patrols and back to our base, and I'll help you with your mission.
We can't get around this patrol. Gotta put them down to move along.
PROTECT <color=#fff568>HAWKEYE</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.
Hawkeye is down! Now we'll never find the Resistance HQ.
You guys have a knack for taking down Hydra. Nicely done.
Do you guys have Hydra in your dimension?
Unfortunately, yes. "If a head is cut off, two more shall take its place."
I take it they don't rule your planet like they do here?
Not so much. But we've got our own problems. An unstoppable, multi-dimensional alien army recently invaded us.
Frankly, that sounds like a lot more fun than what's going on here.
Hawkeye, nice to run into you here. Red Skull will be pleased to finally have your head.
If we take out Crossbones first, his platoon will scatter.
They took out Hawkeye! We have no way to find the Resistance HQ now.
Hawkeye, welcome back to HQ. Looks like you found some new friends along the way?
Director, this group saved my skin out there. We owe them. They come from another dimension and need our help.
The S.H.I.E.L.D. Resistance is on its last leg. If we don't take down Red Skull soon, we'll never free the world from Hydra.
Perhaps we can help. We need to take the Siege Perilous from Red Skull.
We've been trying to get that artifact from Red Head for years. If you manage that, we could turn the tide.
Director! Hydra troops have breached the perimeter! They've found us!
Natasha, you've been working for Hydra all along? How could you?
Give up now. You cannot defeat Red Skull. Hydra is far too powerful.
We have to take out the Hydra Operators before they can call in air support!
We're running out of time. Take out the operators!
We're finished. Their bombers will be here any minute!
We need to bring the fight directly to Red Skull. I've got an idea...
There's a Hydra lab nearby that I hacked into. Red Skull's spymaster is scheduled to be there today.
If we can get inside and corner him, we can grab his access codes and use them to get into Red Skull's bunker.
That lab has a bunch of civilian scientists working there. We need to protect them if we get into a firefight.
Remember, we need to protect the civilians at all costs.
PROTECT THE <color=#fff568>CIVILIANS</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.
Red Skull's spymaster is in the lab up ahead. Let's move!
So who is this mysterious spymaster of Red Skull?
Well, he used to run S.H.I.E.L.D., but it turned out he was part of Hydra all along.
Oh. I thought you were going to say someone else.
So you have Fury in your dimension, too? Is he a manipulative and deceptive mastermind or a good guy?
Quake, surrender now before your people get hurt.
Fat chance, Fury. You betrayed your people and the cause. Today, we're putting you down for good.
DEFEAT <color=#fff568>NICK FURY</color> TO WIN THIS MISSION.
Fury's down. I've got the access codes. Let's get out of here!
Captain, the Skull's Nest is just up ahead. Based on the blueprints, we can gain access here.
Good work, Hawkeye. We need to take out any Hydra patrols we encounter to avoid sounding the alarm.
Hydra Operators are part of this patrol. Take them out quickly to avoid the alarm.
If they sound the alarm we're done for.
We can't let them sound the alarm!
We're too late. No way to Red Skull now. The fortress is on lockdown.
Area is secured. Let's keep moving.
Slight change of plans. I'm picking up chatter that Hydra has S.H.I.E.L.D. Resistance fighters up ahead.
If we can free them from their cells and get them into the fight, it'll increase our odds.
Sounds reasonable. We'll provide the cover you need.
We need to free these S.H.I.E.L.D. prisoners.
PROTECT THE <color=#fff568>S.H.I.E.L.D. RESISTANCE PRISONERS</color> AND DEFEAT <color=#fff568>ALL ENEMIES</color> TO WIN.
Our resistance fighters have been taken out. Fall back!
Red Skull's subterreanean bunker is up ahead. Time to end this.
If we defeat Red Skull, you can have the Siege Perilous for your world.
Thank you, Captain. We won't let you down.
You cannot hope to defeat me. Hydra has, and will always, rule this world.
DEFEAT <color=#fff568>RED SKULL</color> TO WIN THIS MISSION.
With Red Skull gone, Hydra has lost its leader. Now we need to capitalize on the momentum.
We are forever in your debt. When you need us, we'll come to your aid.
And here is the Siege Perilous.
What do you need this thing for, anyway?
It's a key. A key that opens a magical gate to another dimension, and maybe to victory.
Good luck retaking the world. And keep an eye out for any interdimensional alien invaders.
I've located a dimension with the final artifact we need to open the portal to the Nexus.
You found the Warlock's Eye? We must go there immediately.
And lay waste to any who stand in our way.
Not so fast, Mordo. This dimension is ruled by a benevolent God of Thunder, Thor.
I don't care if it's ruled by the God of Adorable Puppies.
If it stands in the way of our goal, we must eliminate it.
If we treat every obstacle as a threat, we make enemies out of everyone.
We have to be better than that. We will negotiate with this God King Thor.
Perhaps we can even make an ally out of him in our war.
Halt! If you seek an audience with the God King, Thor Odinson, you must prove yourselves worthy.
You have shown great spirit. Come! Let us speak...
Good King Thor, we are travelers from another dimension. We need to "borrow" an artifact, the Warlock's Eye, to stop a threat to our dimension.
The Warlock's Eye? I cannot simply "lend" items of power to strangers from another land.
Would it make any difference if I told you that this threat will eventually wipe out your dimension if we do not stop it in ours?
Possibly. You seem noble in your cause and manner. I will grant you your wish, wizard. On one condition...
You must complete the Three Trials of Asgard. If you do, I will grant you the Warlock's Eye.
Trials? Really? Fine. Let's get this over with.
I like your confidence, sorcerer. Let the Trials begin!
First you must best my Captain of the Guard in the Trial of Strength.
Welcome to the Trial of Strength. Get ready to get your butt kicked.
The true test begins in the next chamber. Prepare yourselves.
The final test in the Trial of Strength stands before you.
He is known as the Unbreakable. Nothing will pierce his skin.
Defeat him, and you will move on to the second trial.
DEFEAT <color=#fff568>LUKE CAGE</color> TO WIN THIS MISSION.
Most impressive. Though the next trial will prove more difficult, I am sure of it.
The second trial will put your team's wits and reflexes to the test.
You must defeat my blind Seer: The Daredevil.
I can sense your fear. But don't worry, this will all be over with soon enough.
We have two more trials to get through.
And then King Thor will give us the Warlock's Eye.
I still think we should just take it from him by force.
That way only makes enemies, not allies. And we need all the allies we can get.
Very well. Bring on the next challenge.
The final test of this trial lies ahead. Good luck. You will need it.
Who do you have in store for us now?
Why none other than my brother, Loki himself!
He is a master of trickery. If you defeat him, you will be worthy of the third trial.
This sort of thing bores me. Let's get it over with, shall we?
Hah! Seeing Loki be defeated gets me EVERY time. On to the final trial you go.
The third trial begins with a test against the best headhunters from across the entire realm.
I suggested a dance-off, but King Thor says this has to be a trial by combat.
In order to be worthy of the final test, you must defeat my champions once again... all at once.
The test of a true warrior.
Now let's see how you fare against us at full strength.
Well done. Come with me to the next chamber to face the final challenge.
You have proven to be quite impressive, fighting against great champions and numbers.
If you wish me to grant you the Warlock's Eye, you have but one simple task remaining.
HAH! I like your spirit! Now let's see how you fare against the ruler of this realm.
We must combine our strengths and wits if we have any hope of defeating Thor.
<color=#fff568>THOR THE GOD KING</color> IS A FORCE TO BE RECKONED WITH!
Well done! I am honor-bound to fulfill your request...
...and grant you use of the Warlock's Eye.
But I must ask, what use have you of this powerful artifact?
We need it to enter the Nexus of all Realities to defeat an interdimensional alien invasion from destroying the Multiverse.
When put that way, I probably should have just given it to you in the first place.
Regardless, you have proven worthy allies.
If you need help from the Kingdom of Asgard, we will come to your aid.
Thank you, Thor Odinson. And now we must return to our home and find a way to save it.
We've got to take out the operator before he opens the portal.
That operator is trying to open the portal.
We're too late! They've opened the portal.
Containment pod getting into position. Hold them off.
Containment pod in position. Calibrating. Just a bit longer.
We've caught the subject. Now let's get'em back to the Helicarrier.
They're too tough! We need to fall back!
There's too many of them! We can't hold the--

An aggressive scrapper who inflicts terrible damage to foes at range. Prefers to team up with Groot.
