Here's a gift from us to you.

Thank you for leading the charge against Ultimus! Here are 50 <color=#fff568>POWER CORES</color> to help you get started.

Refer back to your <color=#fff568>INBOX</color> for tips, updates, and news about the game.

Best of luck, Commander.
Congratulations on unlocking a new CAMPAIGN.

There's nothing like an interdimensional threat to bring heroes and villains together. Recruit a squad of at least 3 <color=#fff568>VILLAINS</color> to join the fight against Ultimus. Only characters with the <color=#9e0b0f>VILLAIN</color> trait may participate in the <color=#fff568>VILLAINS UNITED</color> campaign.\n\nBest of luck, Commander.
Do you know about the Villains Campaign?

There's nothing like an interdimensional threat to bring heroes and villains together. Complete HEROES ASSEMBLE Chapter 2 and recruit a squad of at least 3 <color=#fff568>VILLAINS</color> to participate in the <color=#fff568>VILLAINS UNITED</color> Campaign. Tip: If you don't have enough villains, try your hand at the Elektra event and the Crossbones event.\n\nBest of luck, Commander.
Test your squad (and your wit) against others!

Compete against other Commanders in <color=#fff568>BLITZ</color> to win various milestone rewards. The best prize goes to the Commander with the greatest number of points.

Points are rewarded for every match you win. Earn more points by beating stronger opponents! Win consecutive matches and you'll be promoted to a higher tier, increasing your point multiplier; the higher your tier, the greater the multiplier. Lose twice in a row and you'll be demoted a tier.

A word of caution: Fighting battles in Blitz is exhausting. After every match, the characters who participated must recover and cannot be used for a period of time. Use <color=#fff568>BLITZ CHARGES</color> to recover your characters instantly. Earn <color=#fff568>BLITZ CHARGES</color> in <color=#fff568>CHALLENGES</color>, <color=#fff568>MILESTONES</color>, and other parts of the game. Here are some to get you started.

Best of luck, Commander.
Complete CHALLENGES daily to win resources.

Congratulations on unlocking <color=#fff568>CHALLENGES</color>, Commander. Every day you can complete a set of <color=#fff568>CHALLENGES</color> to win various resources that will aid you in your fight against Ultimus. You may only successfully complete each <color=#fff568>CHALLENGE</color> 3 times a day; however, you may attempt them as many times as you'd like.\n\nGo and test your might, Commander!
Cooperate with your Alliance to take on RAIDS!

Join forces with your alliance to battle through <color=#fff568>RAID</color> missions and earn <color=#fff568>RAID CREDITS</color>!

Use RAID CREDITS to purchase:
Character Shards
Blue & Purple Gear Pieces

Here are some supplies to help you out!
Commander, we've sent you supplies. We hope it helps in your ongoing battles!
Commander, you have been acknowledged as a top contender in Blitz. Congratulations on proving your fighting prowess. Claim your reward now.
Commander, you have shown excellent skill and teamwork in Raids. Claim your reward now.

Commander, we recently experienced some unexpected technical difficulties. Our top technicians are working hard to prevent its reoccurrence. In the meanwhile, here are some resources to thank you for understanding.

The <color=#fff568>TREMORS ORB</color> is available for purchase in the <color=#fff568>STORE</color> for a limited time. Each orb has an increased chance of dropping <color=#fff568>QUAKE</color> shards. Don't miss this opportunity to add Quake to your roster!

Anyway, looks like that's gonna be a no-go, my friend. Ultimus, that big blue space invader, BLEW THE PLACE UP!!! What the ****!? They made THE BEST chimichangas, and now they're gone forever!

Commander, we recently experienced some unexpected technical difficulties, but our top technicians have identified and resolved the issue. Here are some resources to thank you for understanding.
Info and Update on How It Works

We'd like to provide some information on how characters are released in MARVEL Strike Force. Generally, a new character makes their debut as the main prize in Blitz mode. At the same time, that hero is made available for purchase in the Featured Character Orb. Once the Blitz ends, the character is added to the Ultimus Orb. After some time, the character is added to the Premium Orb. Finally, the character is added to a campaign node, a store, an orb, etc. This is the usual path for our characters but does not apply to all of them. Characters released through events, such as Deadpool, may be released through other game modes.

Black Panther, Doctor Strange, and Vision are the first characters to go through this process and have been added to the Ultimus Orb.

Thank you for playing MARVEL Strike Force!
--MARVEL Strike Force Dev Team

Good luck, Commander.

- The number of points required to qualify for rank rewards has increased.

We hope you enjoy these changes! We'll continue to monitor Blitz and introduce new updates as needed to continue improving your Blitz experience. Thank you for playing MARVEL Strike Force!

Hello Commander, Here's some information on upcoming balance changes to help you plan your team building strategy. Currently, characters that provide hefty quantities of speed status effects (Speed Up/Slow) are dominating the top of the charts in Arena mode. In the interest of establishing a good foundation to balance all other characters, we are planning some changes here. Specifically, we're contemplating a reduction in the Speed Up and Slow status effects from a 50% speed adjustment to a 30% speed adjustment. We're targeting early August for this change. We'll also be speeding up some of our slower characters, such as Hulk, to ensure their usefulness once they lose that extra speed bump. We're putting this information out now so that players can decide for themselves how they would prefer to continue investing in those characters well before the changes go live. As we move ahead, we'll also be updating other characters more aggressively, starting with the recent changes to Vision and Spider-Man. This means more frequent updates to underutilized characters and more tactical options to work with. We look forward to seeing what kind of teams you create with these upcoming adjustments. Good luck, Commander! Full details can be accessed on the MARVEL Strike Force website. --MARVEL Strike Force Dev Team

Welcome to the latest update of MARVEL Strike Force!

New in this release:
 - Four new playable characters releasing over the course of this update: Scarlet Witch, Ms. Marvel, Loki, and Nick Fury
 - Participate in two new Character Event Campaigns and one new Team-Up Event
 - S.H.I.E.L.D. minions have been revamped in anticipation of the Nick Fury Legendary Event
 - Updated login calendar now includes both a 7-day and 30-day calendar
 - Battle in the new European Forest environment
 - Preview which alliance members are in a Raid S.T.R.I.K.E. Team
 - Potential raid paths now become highlighted when a player selects a raid node
 - The main store has been redesigned
 - Updated combat HUD now shows additional info
 - Vision's Ultimate now gives an increased chance to clear buffs when he's teamed up with Scarlet Witch
 - Various bug fixes and polish throughout

The full briefing can be accessed on the MARVEL Strike Force website.

Join Scarlet Witch in the battle against Ultimus now!

--MARVEL Strike Force Dev Team

 - Star-Lord
 - Loki

These updates are coming soon. Stay tuned!

-- MARVEL Strike Force Dev Team

Commander,

To increase their viability in the current meta game, we have improved the stats and abilities of the following:
 - Thanos
 - Loki
 - Star-Lord

Thanos
 - Base stats - Damage and speed increased.
 - Brutal Assault (Special) - 100% chance for Offense Down available earlier and Taunt increased to 2 turns at level 6.
 - Energy Bomb (Ultimate) - Damage done has been increased.
 - Titan Eternal (Passive) - Ability energy now generated when an enemy is defeated by anyone on your team.

Loki
 - Base stats - Damage and armor increased.
 - Eldritch Bolt (Basic) - Final resulting damage increased and changed to Piercing, and chance to gain Evade increased.
 - Mind Control (Special) - Damage increased and chance for second attacker increased at level 6.
 - Mirror Image (Ultimate) - Added chance for a third Mirror Image at level 6 but ability no longer starts fully charged.
 - God of Mischief (Passive) - On Spawn, Speed Bar filled to 100% and Mystic Controller Allies gain some Speed Bar fill. Also added Focus and Resist for self and Mystic Controller Allies.

Star-Lord
 - Base stats - Health increased.
 - Element Gun (Basic) - Reformulated to make the chain more reliable.
 - Clever Distraction (Special) - Now grants Ability Energy to adjacent allies.
 - Elemental Blast (Ultimate) - Target damage increased and now always calls an assist from a Guardian ally.
 - Improvisation (Passive) - Guardian allies now receive extra speed and damage, chance to grant Ability Energy increased, and Ability Energy will now be granted to Guardian and adjacent allies.

Full details can be accessed on the MARVEL Strike Force website.

--MARVEL Strike Force Dev Team

Good luck, Commander.
--Director Fury

Hello Commanders,

Our midsummer update has arrived, and with it comes the celebration of the 10-Year Anniversary of the Marvel Cinematic Universe! This month, Scarlet Witch unlocks the secrets of the Nexus of All Realities, and S.T.R.I.K.E. enlists the plucky and powerful Ms. Marvel.

So what's coming next? In the last update we mentioned that we were considering a reduction to Speed Up and Slow status effects in the interest of bringing Black Widow and Quake into formation with other characters in the game. The community has had wide-ranging discussions about the pros and cons, and we considered those perspectives carefully. While there are merits to leveling the playing field for new characters, we don't want to invalidate the hard work that players put into earning existing characters, so after some serious consideration, we've elected not to make those changes.

While we're not changing how speed-based status effects function, top strategies will continue to evolve over time. This month we're introducing several new characters, each with a unique place in the strategic landscape. Scarlet Witch is already available, and with her comes the key elements of a powerful Mystic team. Scarlet Witch, Vision, Mordo, Dr. Strange, and the recently improved Thanos make a mean combination that can take on top teams in Arena mode, and many additional strategic teams remain to be discovered.

Full details can be accessed on the MARVEL Strike Force website.

--MARVEL Strike Force Dev Team

Welcome to the latest update of MARVEL Strike Force!

New in this release:
 - Resolved issue where some players were unable to access orbs in the Store or view mission rewards

--MARVEL Strike Force Dev Team

Hello Commander,

Ms. Marvel has now officially joined S.T.R.I.K.E. to help save the world from Ultimus and protect the Nexus. Her assist and energy synergies have enabled a variety of new Hero trait teams to take the field. The story continues in the upcoming Scarlet Witch/Ms. Marvel team-up event.

The secret mission to save Nick Fury is now underway. He is extremely powerful when paired with his S.H.I.E.L.D. minion team and is an especially excellent choice for Arena defense. The event will return again in the near future, so you'll soon have another chance to complete the event and add Director Fury to your roster.

The new level 65 raid, Ultimus VI, is now active, and Deadpool raids will now be running with 12-hour timers and will grant Deadpool Orb Fragments in all reward tiers.

In October a Mutant origin will be added for characters who currently have the Mutant trait. Origins determine what type of gear a character uses, so this means that there will be a full set of brand-new mutant-specific gear to collect. Characters that currently have the Mutant trait will automatically have their equipped gear converted over to the new origin, so no progress will be lost during the transition. As you may have guessed, there will be several more mutant characters joining the fray over the next few months.

Full details can be accessed on the MARVEL Strike Force website.

--MARVEL Strike Force Dev Team

Nick Fury and his horde of minions stand in the way of S.T.R.I.K.E. and their goal.

Spider-Man confronts mercenaries attempting to smuggle interdimensional orbs into New York City.
Get past Elektra to stop Kingpin from delivering interdimensional orbs to a mysterious benefactor.
Take down Kingpin before he delivers the interdimensional orbs to his mysterious benefactor.
Get past the Hydra guards to reclaim the interdimensional orbs.
Defeat Crossbones to make your way to the Hydra Lab.
Stop the Winter Soldier from delivering the interdimensional orbs.
Fight past enemy forces to prevent Hydra from activating an interdimensional portal.
Stop the Hydra Operators from sending the orbs through an interdimensional portal.
Secure the portal from a mysterious alien force.
Corrupted heroes are sowing chaos in the streets.
A corrupted Iron Man launches an assault on Wakanda.
A pack of corrupted Rocket Raccoons is loose in the city.
The team must take out the Kree guards before they sound the alarm.
Isolate and abduct Ronan to bring him back for interrogation.
The team must hold out until they can evacuate their prisoner.
Ultimus's forces launch a counterattack on the S.T.R.I.K.E. base to rescue Ronan.
Stop a second assault on the S.T.R.I.K.E. base from Ultimus's forces.
A final wave of Ultimus's forces assault the S.T.R.I.K.E. base.
Protect Black Widow while she accesses the schematics.
Defend the team long enough for the extraction pod to arrive.
Infiltrate an Ultron facility to acquire the key component needed to build the portal.
Fight through Ultron's forces to get to the heart of the facility.
Defeat Ultron to acquire the key component needed to activate the portal.
The Hand has the final piece needed to power the interdimensional portal.
Ultimus's forces are attacking the S.T.R.I.K.E. base. Hold them back until the portal is ready.
Defend Nick Fury so he can activate the portal before time runs out.
Defeat a patrol of corrupted Ravagers before they call for reinforcements.
The team fights their way into a Kree lab to attempt to recreate the vaccine inside Captain America.
Defend the S.H.I.E.L.D. Operator until she is able to reverse engineer the vaccine from Captain America.
The team is ambushed by a squad of Thors while attempting to escape with a weakened Captain America.
The corrupted version of the Defenders, the Annihilators, have tracked down the team.
The team must ambush a Kree patrol to steal their identities and sneak aboard a Kree battlecruiser.
The team must clear out a cargo hold on the Kree battlecruiser while it travels back to Earth.
The team is discovered by Ronan and must defeat him before he alerts the entire ship of their presence.
The team must fight their way off the Kree Battlecruiser and back to the S.T.R.I.K.E. base to warn about the invasion.
Return to Captain America's dimension to help him find the Hulk in Wakanda.
The Hulk is not what you expected. You must defeat him to save Bruce!
Protect the weakened Hulk from Korath and his mercenaries.
Bruce's research facility in Nevada holds the key to saving the Hulk from madness. Gain access to the facility.
Ultimus has Hydra controlling Bruce's facility. Fight your way though.
Hydra is throwing everything they've got at you. Make them pay.
The corrupted Guardians of the Galaxy want payback.
The team must make their way past the corrupted Avengers elite!
Protect Bruce as you revert the corruption in his system.
Help Thor unlock the Asgardian tomb of an ancient enemy. Fight off Ultimus's forces.
Fight Evil Ultimus's forces for control of the first key.
Korath has been sent by the Kree Resistance to capture our dimension's Ultimus. Beat him to the second key.
Fight Korath and his forces for the second key.
Ultimus's forces lay a trap at the third key. Fight them off.
Fight Ultimus's forces for control of the third key.
Fight your way to Nexus Ultimus's tomb in Sweden.
Continue the fight to Ultimus's tomb. Korath and Evil Ultimus are in pursuit.
Release Nexus Ultimus from his tomb.
In search of the Ka Stone, the Mystic S.T.R.I.K.E. team come upon a dimension ruled by Loki that has yet to be conquered by Ultimus.
Protect Doctor Strange from the Hand fanatics as he searches nearby for the Ka Stone's location.
The Loki of this realm has the Ka Stone. Defeat him and his Hand followers to retrieve the stone and leave this dimension.
In search of the Wand of Watoomb, the team arrive in a lawless wasteland ruled by Kingpin and Nobu.
Defeat enemy operators before local hunters can call for reinforcements.
Defeat Kingpin to take possession of the mystical artifact.
In search of the Darkhold, the team enter a dimension ruled by Baron Mordo and the Hand.
Defeat the Hand Operators to bring down the mystical barrier protecting the throne room.
Defeat Baron Mordo and recover the Darkhold.
The Mystic S.T.R.I.K.E. team arrive in a dimension and encounter soldiers loyal to Hydra attacking Hawkeye.
Help Hawkeye fight his way through Hydra forces back to the S.H.I.E.L.D. Resistance hideout.
Crossbones stands in the way of the Mystic S.T.R.I.K.E. team and the S.H.I.E.L.D. Resistance hideout.
Help the Resistance take out the spies before they can contact Hydra headquarters.
The Resistance infiltrates a Hydra Lab and need help evacuating civilian scientists while in search of access codes to Red Skull's fortress.
Defeat Hydra's spymaster, Nick Fury, to obtain the access codes needed to get to Red Skull.
Take out the Hydra Operators before they can lock down the fortress.
Help the Resistance save S.H.I.E.L.D. prisoners while fighting through Red Skull's Hydra elite to access his subterranean bunker.
Mystic S.T.R.I.K.E. must defeat Red Skull to take the Siege Perilous and free this dimension from Hydra's rule.
In a dimension ruled by Thor, the Mystic S.T.R.I.K.E. team must complete three trials to gain his favor and obtain the Warlock's Eye.
The team must prove themselves in the first trial to proceed.
Defeat a demigod known as the Unbreakable to pass the first trial.
The second trial puts the team's wits and reflexes to the test.
Defeat God King Thor's champion to face the final stage of the second trial.
Defeat Loki the Trickster God to pass the second trial.
The third trial begins with a test against the best headhunters from across the entire realm.
The Mystic S.T.R.I.K.E. team must now face Thor's champions to proceed.
Only by defeating Thor the God King can the team receive the Warlock's Eye and gain the support of the Asgardian dimension.
Infiltrate a Kree facility to rescue Nick Fury.
Fight your way through the Kree facility to rescue Fury before it's too late.
Get to the Conversion Chamber before Fury is corrupted.
Revert the Conversion process before it is complete to rescue Nick Fury.
The full-scale invasion has begun! Stop invading forces in NYC!
Stop an army of Groots running rampant in Midtown.
Take out invading forces in Russia.
Take down a corrupted Thor before he destroys Iceland.
Prevent an Ultron army from overrunning Wakanda.
Sneak onto a Kree transport so you can board the warship.
Lead an assault on the Kree warship.
Rescue captured S.H.I.E.L.D. and Hydra agents.
Escape the Kree warship before it blows up.
Fight your way to the portal above Hell's Kitchen.
Protect a demolitions team as they close the portal.
Hydra controls a portal in Sydney.
Corrupted Punisher has a horde of corrupted Hulks protecting the portal!
A hoard of A.I.M. operatives are being controlled by a mysterious man.
Corrupted Red Skull and Winter Soldiers protect the Berlin portal!
A portal in Argentina is controlled by corrupted S.H.I.E.L.D. agents!
Corrupted Quake protects the portal on the rooftops of Buenos Aires!
The last known portal appears to be in the Himalayas.
The Hand stand in your way to the portal.
Destroy the final portal in Nepal before it's too late!
Clear out Ultimus's forces near K'un-Lun.
Help Iron Fist close the mystical seal in K'un-Lun.
Work with Black Panther and Iron Fist to close a portal in Wakanda and recover the Ka Stone.
Help Nobu recover the Siege Perilous in Tokyo.
Protect Nobu as he closes the demonic gate in Japan.
Drive out the enemy forces as they prepare to attack the Sanctum Sanctorum in New York City.

Drive Ultimus's forces out of Norway as they pursue the Warlock's Eye.
Protect Thor as he seals the gateway off from Ultimus's horde.
Manufacture the vaccine at the A.I.M. Laboratory.
Expel the enemies attacking the VIPs.
Defeat the Corrupted forces onboard the Helicarrier.
Defend the devices triangulating the location of the Conversion Warship.
Defeat the converted guarding the Conversion Engine.
Fend off the converted while extracting the data of the Conversion Engine.
Flee from Ultimus and escape the Conversion Warship.

Evacuate the civilians from Fury's Helicarrier before it is destroyed by Ultimus's fleet.
Stop the Hydra Operators from detonating a bomb at a summit of world leaders!
Ultimus's Hand and A.I.M. forces have taken control of Rio de Janeiro. Help evacuate civilians to prevent them from being enslaved.
With S.T.R.I.K.E. being forced underground, the team must fight for their lives against Ultimus's kill squads.
Corrupted Nobu and his Hand forces seek an unconditional surrender from the S.T.R.I.K.E. team.

Infiltrate the Hoover Dam facility and protect Black Widow as she adds the corruption vaccine to the water supply.

As allies arrive from other dimensions, S.T.R.I.K.E. must infiltrate the compound of one of Ultimus's key lieutenants: a corrupted Elektra.

Help Doctor Strange bring the S.T.R.I.K.E. team to Transylvania and face off against corrupted Kree and A.I.M. forces.
With Doctor Strange's help, defeat a corrupted Baron Mordo to disrupt Ultimus's control over Europe.
Help Nick Fury infiltrate occupied Washington D.C. and take on corrupted Hydra and Ultron forces.
With Nick Fury's support, take out the corrupted Red Skull, appointed leader of the Ultimus-controlled United States.
Head to Vancouver and eliminate Ultimus's last and most dangerous member of his inner circle: a corrupted Wolverine.
The S.T.R.I.K.E. team must secure an interdimensional portal from corrupted Kree soldiers.
Fight past Bullseye and Black Panther to get to the safehouse.

Defeat corrupted Iron Fist in order to learn the key to unlocking the mystic barrier protecting Ultimus's stronghold.
The S.T.R.I.K.E. team must protect the Strange Society while making their way to Ultimus's stronghold in the Black Forest.

Fight beside Thor the God King and defeat Ultimus to seal him away in the Nexus of All Realities once and for all!

Director Fury tells Scientist Supreme to fix the Ultron problem.

In Europe, take down Black Widow's Hydra guards.
Take out Black Widow, Queen of Europe.

The Villains need to fight their way to a facility in Awesometown that can help locate Earth's Ego Seed.
Protect the Operator while he hacks the power plant's system in search of the Seed.
Fight off the hit squads as you make your way to the Ego Seed.
Take out the last of the hit squad before they call for backup.
Gain entry into Star-Lord's primary power facility in Hasselhofftopia.
The Villains must fight their way through heavy S.H.I.E.L.D. forces in the facility.
The facility's central core is protected by Star-Lord's Avengers. Protect the Operator as he extracts the Ego Seed.
The Villains Squad has to get past Star-Lord in order to escape the collapsing dimension!
Deadpool seeks revenge for Ultimus destroying his favorite chimichanga restaurant.
The mercs are not happy that Deadpool is getting in their way. Bullseye aims (WINK WINK) to get back at him.
Wolverine seeks to take control of the Deadpool situation.
Deadpool and Wolverine search for Cable who has been captured by Ultimus.
Save Cable from corrupted Spider-Man and his cronies.
With help from Cable and Deadpool, break into the facility that houses the corrupted Techno-Organic Virus.
Deadpool and Cable encounter corrupted Thanos guarding the corrupted Techno Virus supply.
Fight off an angry mob of minions!
Stop Scientist Supreme and Ultron from generating a new batch of the corrupted Techno-Organic Virus.
Take out corrupted Vision before his Ultron Operators can create a new batch of the Techno Virus, and to ensure it can never be recreated.
We salute you Captain America! Thank you for your service and Americawesomeness.
This mission stars my Hydra buddy Bob. And a bunch of other Hydra guys. ENJOY.
They say red is the new black, so you'll be SUPER FAB once these folks make you over.
He's a mouse, right? He's got the pointy snout and the fur and the tiny widdle ears... Yep, definitely a mouse.
When you finish this round of tests, I'll give you a nice cape! I prooooomise.
There's nothing that I like more than being sliced and diced by a bunch of baddie blades.
There's nothing that I like more than being shot to swiss cheese by a bunch of baddie blasters.
It's all AOE damagers here. Explosions for YOU! And explosions for YOU! And YOU get some shrapnel!
Oh boy, this mission is going to be really annoying. So dodgy.
Me as an Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D.? Where's Agent Coulson when you need him?
Behold, the avocado zombie! Created by the geniuses at A.I.M., courtesy of yours truly.
This mission has some kind of stuff in it I guess? \nI can't even.
You stand accused of being accused for accurately accusing the accuser of accusations that... Look, Ronan's in this one.
You talking to me? I own these streets, so you MUST be talking to me. Kiss the ring.
Hear ye, hear ye! It has been ordained by those on high that ye shall face the noblest of nobles in a fight to the death.
Whose skull do you think is more red? Mine? Or... FINE. He gets this one.
The best defense is a good offense! And I'm SUPER OFFENSIVE.
There was an idea to bring together a group of remarkable people. Sadly, I'm not one of them.
You call that a knife? THIS is a knife. Well, a really big gun-shaped knife that shoots bullet-shaped knives.
Good news, everyone! You get to fight a bunch of guys with a name that rhymes with Polverine.
...with my little eye something that will stun you, smack you, punch & shoot you, arrow you, stab you, and heckle you. Maybe not in that order.
And for my NEXT trick, I will make these bullets disappear into these goofy magicians.
This mission node is brought to you by Spider-Man's precious, cherubic, boy cheeks. So pinchable!
Now you no longer have to IMAGINE me being a member of the Avengers. I've made it to the Big Time, baby!
Nothing but happy trees in this peaceful forest... And lethal trees... plus rabid raccoons, and frenzied wolverines, and snakes.
Time for a fight against me and all my best bros. There's bromance in the air! Or... wait, that's body spray.
They used to bleed people for their health, and you will be SO HEALTHY soon.
The Defenders could really benefit from having me join the team. Now YOU get to see just how awesome it would be.

Requires 5 S.H.I.E.L.D. agents.

Recommended for level 20+, Gear Tier 3+, Level 1+ Abilties.

S.H.I.E.L.D. forces take on a squad of mercenaries that have stolen the contents of a containment module storing one of Iron Man's old suits.

Requires 5 S.H.I.E.L.D. agents at 2 Stars.

Recommended for level 25+, Gear Tier 4+, Level 1+ Abilties.

Tony sends the S.H.I.E.L.D. team to stop the mercs from selling the Mask of Ogun to the Hand.

Requires 5 S.H.I.E.L.D. agents at 3 Stars.

Recommended for level 30+, Gear Tier 5+, Level 2+ Abilities.

The S.H.I.E.L.D. squad attempts to recover the stolen Kree Monolith from the mercs at their home base: an abandoned Hydra armory.

Requires 5 S.H.I.E.L.D. agents at 4 Stars.

Recommended for level 40+, Gear Tier 6+, Level 3+ Abilities.

While investigating the Blue Area of the Moon, the S.H.I.E.L.D. team encounters a squad of the Lunatic Legion devoted to Ultimus.

Requires 5 S.H.I.E.L.D. agents at 5 Stars.

Recommended for level 50+, Gear Tier 8+, Level 4+ Abilities.

The S.H.I.E.L.D. agents must storm a lab where A.I.M. scientists are developing a Terrigen Bomb for the Legion.

Requires 5 S.H.I.E.L.D. agents at 6 Stars.

Recommended for level 60+, Gear Tier 9+, Level 5+ Abilities.

After boarding the Kree warship in possession of the bomb, the team encounters a group of corrupted S.H.I.E.L.D. agents led by a corrupted Nick Fury.

Requires 5 S.H.I.E.L.D. agents at 7 Stars.

Recommended for level 65+, Gear Tier 11+, Level 6+ Abilities.

Defeat the Legion's corrupted Avengers and disarm the Terrigen Bomb before it explodes.
Help Ant-Man sneak into corrupted Vision's facility so he can sabotage the Techno Virus distribution device.
Now inside the lab, Ant-Man and the team encounter corrupted Iron Man and Spider-Man guarding the Virus distribution device.
Corrupted versions of Ant-Man's favorite heroes stand in the way of the device and his mission.
Ant-Man must infiltrate an abandoned H.A.M.M.E.R. warehouse controlled by corrupted S.H.I.E.L.D. guards.
Ant-Man and the squad must secure a mysterious crate of orbs from an elite group of S.H.I.E.L.D. agents.

Corrupted Vision stands in the way of the team and the data they need on the Kree ship.
Wasp and Ant-Man must storm a corrupted Hand monastery with access to the dimension of the mini-Earth.
Corrupted Hand forces will stop at nothing to keep Ant-Man and the Wasp from accessing the portal.
Stop the corrupted Wasp and her operators before they permanently seal the portal to the orb's home dimension!

Ms. Marvel and the team encounter another group of undead spirits as they follow the crystal to Scarlet Witch.
As Scarlet Witch attempts to fight off demons as they surround her, Ms. Marvel attempts to intervene and save her.

Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.
Commander XP is used to increase your Commander Level.
VIP XP is used to increase your VIP Level, which increases certain Daily Login Rewards and grants access to additional content. Earn VIP XP through the Daily Login Rewards and purchasing Power Cores!
Campaign Energy Refill is used to refresh your Campaign Energy. If you do not have enough Campaign Energy Refills, you can use Power Cores to recharge your Campaign Energy.
War Energy Refill is used to refresh your War Energy. If you do not have enough War Energy Refills, you can use Power Cores to recharge your War Energy.
Raid Energy Refill is used to refresh your Raid Energy. If you do not have enough Raid Energy Refills, you can use Power Cores to recharge your Raid Energy.
Use Blitz Charges to recharge your characters to fight in Blitz.
Blitz Charges are used to reset cooldown timers on your characters in Blitz.
War Health Pack is used to heal and revive your characters in War.
Raid Health Pack is used to heal and revive your characters in Raids.

Challenges provide a variety of resources and change every day.
Raids challenge your entire alliance to work cooperatively to complete a series of missions before time runs out.
Only VILLAIN characters can participate in the Villains Campaign.
BLASTERS and BRAWLERS deal heavy damage.
Each character has a combat role trait: PROTECTOR, BLASTER, BRAWLER, SUPPORT, and CONTROLLER.
Each character has an origin trait: BIO, SKILL, MYSTIC, and TECH.
A character's total power is a combination of their character level, gear, ability level, and star rank.
PROTECTORS use the Taunt effect and other abilities to draw the enemy's attacks.
Ultimus has conquered the Earths of countless dimensions and converted their heroes to build his army.
Characters gain ability energy in their Special and Ultimate abilities each turn.
Many abilities have an energy cost. Abilities gain a charge at the beginning of each turn.
Characters act in order according to their speed.
The Taunt effect forces enemies to target the character who is taunting.
Characters with the Stealth effect active cannot be the target of an enemy attack.
Area of Effect attacks impact the primary target and all enemies adjacent to it.
S.T.R.I.K.E. stands for the Special Tactical Reserve for Interdimensional Key Events.
S.T.R.I.K.E. is an elite division of S.H.I.E.L.D. that specializes in threats that arise from beyond our dimension.
Use S.H.I.E.L.D. training programs to level up your characters.
Collect all six pieces of gear to upgrade a character to the next gear tier.
Collect character shards to increase a character's star rank and gain greater power.
Characters with the PROTECTOR trait specialize in taking the brunt of the damage in order to protect their teammates.
Characters with the BRAWLER trait prefer to get up close and personal with their foes for maximum damage.
Characters with the BLASTER trait bombard enemies with damage at long range.
Characters with the SUPPORT trait assist their allies with healing and positive combat effects.
Characters with the CONTROLLER trait manipulate the battlefield by disrupting their foes and providing special benefits to their allies.
The Hand is an ancient shadow organization whose influence spans from the criminal underworld to global politics.
The Dark Watch is a mercenary outfit that operates outside the law and will take any job for the right price.
Hydra is a secretive organization bent on global domination.
A.I.M.(Advanced Idea Mechanics) is a multinational corporation dealing in cutting edge scientific research and development.
The Kree Empire is an advanced interstellar civilization with a powerful military.
The Ravagers are spacefaring pirates, thieves, and smugglers who live by a code: "Steal from everybody."
Ultron's automated factories are capable of manufacturing an entire army of his drones in mere days if left unchecked.
S.T.R.I.K.E.'s sensor stations are located around the world. They can detect a broad spectrum of interdimensional disturbances.
The Deathproof status effect prevents a character from being defeated when they are reduced to zero Health.
The Regeneration status effect heals the affected character at the beginning of their turn.
The Bleed status effect reduces the affected character's Health at the beginning of their turn.
The First Legion is an elite military force of Kree warriors who have sworn loyalty to Ultimus.
Ultimus uses the Conversion Device to corrupt the free will of heroes and force them to swear loyalty to his cause.
The Grandmaster seeks powerful gladiators. He offers great rewards to those who prove themselves in his arena.
Each character has an origin trait: TECH, SKILL, BIO, or MYSTIC. A character's origin defines what type of gear they require.
Many characters have an affiliation trait, such as AVENGER, DEFENDER, A.I.M., or HYDRA.
Earn three medals on a mission in order to unlock the ability to AUTO WIN and collect rewards automatically.
Assist attacks and Counterattacks are half as powerful as basic attacks.
